snippet.title: Amber Heard Plead Not Guilty
snippet.description:
Amber Heard got herself into some trouble. The actress, known for movies such as Magic Mike and 3 Days to Kill, is facing charges of illegally sneaking her dogs into Australia. Amber is pleading not guilty in hopes that she won't be convicted. The actress, who is married to Johnny Depp, is being accused of transporting the animals via private jet and falsifying documents which violates Australia's security law. Amber released a statement through her lawyer. It sounds like Johnny Depp's wife knows she wasn't supposed to bring dogs into the country the way she did. But there was a misunderstanding at the time. It's not a little issue though. If Amber is found guilty, she faces up to 10 years in prison and a $75,000 fine.

snippet.title: Pretty Actress Amber Heard coming up with a new movie The Danish Girl
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard is an American actress. Heard made her film debut in the acclaimed sports drama Friday Night Lights, starring Billy Bob Thornton. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms. She is acting in movie The Danish Girl. It is an upcoming American biographical drama film directed by Tom Hooper, based on the 2000 novel of the same name by David Ebershoff. The film stars Eddie Redmayne as Lili Elbe, one of the first known recipients of sexual reassignment surgery, Alicia Vikander as Gerda Wegener, along with Matthias Schoenaerts as Hans Axgil and Ben Whishaw. It has been selected to be screened in the main competition section of the 72nd Venice International Film Festival, and it has been selected to be shown in the Special Presentations section of the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival. The film scheduled to be released in a limited release on November 27, 2015 by Focus Features. 

Music: http://www.bensound.com

snippet.title: Sexuality Not The Defining Factor For Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Actress Amber Heard has revealed that she does not need to run away from her sexuality to be herself. The sexy actress came out as a bisexual and she holds that it was a tough decision for her to come out in Hollywood.

So has her marriage to Johnny Depp changed anything for Amber? The diva of an actress answers that there are not much of change but yes some tiny things have taken place in her life!

Carrying on with her sexual preferences, Amber adds that though she does not deny her sexuality, it does not mean that she is defined by it. Oh Amber, no matter what you are into, guys love you not because of your preferences but because of your sex appeal!

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's dogs: Wife Amber Heard summoned over smuggling
snippet.description:
The actress wife of Johnny Depp has been summoned to appear in court over allegations that she smuggled the couple's dogs into Australia.

Amber Heard came under fire in April for failing to declare Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo to authorities on their arrival in Brisbane.

Australia has strict animal quarantine laws to prevent importing infections.

At the time, a minister said the dogs would be put down if they stayed.

"It's time Pistol and Boo buggered off back to the United States," agriculture minister Barnaby Joyce said.

The dogs left the country unharmed at few days later.

However, a subsequent Senate hearing was told that Depp and Heard could be sentenced to as long as 10 years in jail, or be forced to pay a fine of up to $265,000 (£172,000) if they were found guilty of illegally importing then.

Depp is currently filming the latest instalment of the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise on Australia's Gold Coast.

But it is Heard, the star of Friday Night Lights and Magic Mike XXL, who has been ordered to appear in court, Australia's department of agriculture confirmed.

"Ms Amber Heard was served with a summons issued by the Commonwealth Director of Public Prosecutions on July 14," a statement read.

"The CDPP's action follows an incident where a biosecurity officer attended a Gold Coast property in April and found two dogs alleged to be illegally imported.

"All animals entering Australia must have an import permit, and have undergone relevant testing and health checks signed off by a government veterinarian from the exporting country to ensure pests and diseases from overseas are not brought here."

Heard previously criticised the way the case had been handled, and suggested she would not return to the country.

"I have a feeling we're going to avoid the land Down Under from now on, just as much as we can thanks to certain politicians there," she told Australia's NBC.

"I guess everyone tries to go for their 15 minutes, including some government officials."

snippet.title: Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986) is an American actress and model. Heard made her film debut in acclaimed sports drama Friday Night Lights, starring Billy Bob Thornton. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms.
Her breakthrough came in 2008 with roles in Never Back Down and Pineapple Express. She was awarded with Breakthrough Award at Young Hollywood Awards. She got widespread attention after her appearance in films such as The Informers, The Stepfather, Zombieland and The Joneses. She next starred in John Carpenter's The Ward, alongside Nicolas Cage in Drive Angry, and alongside Johnny Depp in The Rum Diary, for which she won a Spotlight Award at Hollywood Film Festival. Her recent films include Paranoia, Machete Kills and 3 Days to Kill.
Regarded as a sex symbol, Heard often appears in magazines' Most Beautiful and Sexiest lists. She is also involved in social activism for causes such as gay rights and abolishing slavery, and is a supporter of Habitat for Humanity, Girl Up United Nations Foundation, The Art of Elysium and Amnesty International.
While in Los Angeles, Heard made appearances in several TV shows and two music videos, Kenny Chesney's "There Goes My Life" and Eisley's "I Wasn't Prepared". She was cast as Liz in the pilot episode of The WB's Jack & Bobby (2004), as Riley in an episode of The Mountain (2004) and she had a brief cameo as a salesgirl in The O.C. (2005). Her first movie role was Maria in Friday Night Lights (2004), starring Billy Bob Thornton. Based on actual events, the movie was both a commercial and critical success. She next starred as Shay in Side FX (2005), an independent horror film, and had supporting roles in Drop Dead Sexy (2005), Price to Pay (2006) and You Are Here (2006). Heard had a more prominent role in Niki Caro's North Country (2005) where she played teenage Josey, Charlize Theron's character whom Amber is fan of. She also appeared in a minor role in Nick Cassavetes' Alpha Dog (2006). In the same year, she starred in an episode of Criminal Minds as Lila Archer, a love interest of main character Spencer Reid. Heard was next cast in the CW's Hidden Palms. On the show she portrayed Greta Matthews, who suffered the losses of both her mother and boyfriend, Eddie, and befriends Johnny, the antihero of the show. In order to get the part, Heard was asked to lose weight. It took her four months between the pilot and the second episode to lose 25 pounds, giving up alcohol, increasing her workouts and following a macrobiotic diet (no meat, dairy or processed sugar). Hidden Palms premiered in the US on May 30, 2007. Ultimately, the CW wrapped the summer series early; instead of the initial 12-episode arc, only 8 were aired. The show ended on July 4, 2007 two weeks earlier than originally planned.
She was cast in the title role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane, a horror film that premiered at the Toronto Film Festival in September 2006. The film immediately garnered attention and a deal was secured with Harvey Weinstein. However, nearly a year after its Toronto début, the movie had not reached theaters. In July 2007, Mandy Lane found a new distribution home and the film finally was released in 2008 with a February UK release and June DVD release. The film's director Jonathan Levine said about Amber's casting in the title role that "there was a certain type of beauty and a certain type of innate intelligence that Amber brought to it that is not something you find every day. Certainly, not something you would find in somebody her age. The wisdom she projects, I thought was pretty remarkable." The Los Angeles Times praised's Heard's acting, saying it's her most "definitive [performance] to date." and The Washington Post stated that Heard gave a "psychologically interesting performance." 
In 2007, Heard also appeared in the 16-minute-long short movie Day 73 with Sarah and Jess Manafort's indie drama Remember the Daze (aka The Beautiful Ordinary), which premiered at the 2007 Los Angeles Film Festival. She then appeared in the Judd Apatow-produced comedy Pineapple Express and the martial arts drama Never Back Down, both of which were released in 2008. Both films were box office success and brought Heard into a mainstream attention, including a win for Breakthrough Award in Hollywood Film Festival. Richard Roeper praised Heard's performance in Pineapple Express.
Heard also made a brief appearance in Showtime's Californication and joined the ensemble cast of 2009's The Informers, based on the Bret Easton Ellis novel of the same title. She also filmed the horror film The Stepfather and the comedy film Ex-Terminators back-to-back in 2008 while promoting Never Back Down, Mandy Lane and Remember the Daze.


Source : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amber_Heard & Google image.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Dog Drama Continues: Amber Heard's Australian Court Case Adjourned Until November
snippet.description:
The dog days aren't over – yet. Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard's Australian court hearing over charges that she illegally brought the couple's two dogs into the country has been adjourned until November, the Associated Press reports.

The actress was summoned to the Southport Magistrates Court in Queensland on Monday to answer for the charges that she illegally imported the dogs – terriers Boo and Pistol – and produced a false document in May.

Heard did not appear on Monday, and the case was adjourned until Nov. 2, according to the BBC.

The star, 29, faces a possible 10-year jail term or large fine come November. Depp, however, has not been charged in the case. Australia's strict quarantine laws have been set to prevent diseases from entering the island nation, according to the BBC.

The legal debacle began back in April, when it was discovered that the couple allegedly failed to declare the animals to customs authorities when they arrived for Depp to film the new Pirates of the Caribbean film. The dogs' presence was discovered by Australian authorities after a dog groomer posted photos of the pups on Facebook.

Australia's Agriculture Minister Barnaby Joyce gave the pair 72 hours to return the dogs to the U.S., and threatened to euthanize the animals if Depp and Heard didn't comply with the orders.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Charged With Taking Dogs Into Oz
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp's wife, Amber Heard, has been charged with illegally bringing the couple's dogs in to Australia - an offence which carries a prison sentence of up to 10 years.
She faces two counts of illegally importing Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo and one count of producing a false document, according to the Commonwealth Department of Public Prosecutions.
The 'tail' began in May when Agriculture Minister Barnaby Joyce accused Depp, 52, of smuggling the dogs aboard his private jet when he returned to Australia to resume filming the fifth movie in the Pirates Of The Caribbean series.
He said at the time: "If we start letting movie stars - even though they've been the sexiest man alive twice - to come into our nation (with pets), then why don't we just break the laws for everybody?" It's time Pistol and Boo b******* off back to the United States."
Australia has strict quarantine regulations to prevent diseases such as rabies from spreading to its shores.
Importation charges carry a maximum penalty of 10 years in prison and a fine of AUD$102,000 (£48,000).
The false document charge, which relates to information on an incoming passenger card, carries a penalty of up to a year in prison and a fine of AUD$10,200.
The couple were given three days to send the dogs back to the US or the pets would be put down.
Just hours before the deadline, a Department of Agriculture officer escorted the terriers from the couple's mansion on Queensland's Gold Coast to the airport, where the dogs were put on a flight to the US.
Joyce's comments were parodied worldwide, prompted a petition to save Pistol and Boo and sparked the social media hashtag #WarOnTerrier.
Asked about the charges during an interview with Sky News, Joyce suggested Heard would not be getting any special treatment.
"You, I, everybody - we're equal before the law," he said.
The prosecutor's office would not answer questions about why Depp was not charged, citing the ongoing nature of the case.
Heard has been summonsed to appear in a Queensland court on 7 September.
In an interview last month, the 29-year-old actress said she and Depp planned to avoid Australia as much as possible in the future "thanks to certain politicians there".

She faces two counts of illegally importing Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo and one count of producing a false document, according to the Commonwealth Department of Public Prosecutions.
The 'tail' began in May when Agriculture Minister Barnaby Joyce accused Depp, 52, of smuggling the dogs aboard his private jet when he returned to Australia to resume filming the fifth movie in the Pirates Of The Caribbean series.
He said at the time: "If we start letting movie stars - even though they've been the sexiest man alive twice - to come into our nation (with pets), then why don't we just break the laws for everybody?" It's time Pistol and Boo b******* off back to the United States."
Australia has strict quarantine regulations to prevent diseases such as rabies from spreading to its shores.
Importation charges carry a maximum penalty of 10 years in prison and a fine of AUD$102,000 (£48,000).
The false document charge, which relates to information on an incoming passenger card, carries a penalty of up to a year in prison and a fine of AUD$10,200.
The couple were given three days to send the dogs back to the US or the pets would be put down.
Just hours before the deadline, a Department of Agriculture officer escorted the terriers from the couple's mansion on Queensland's Gold Coast to the airport, where the dogs were put on a flight to the US.
Joyce's comments were parodied worldwide, prompted a petition to save Pistol and Boo and sparked the social media hashtag #WarOnTerrier.
Asked about the charges during an interview with Sky News, Joyce suggested Heard would not be getting any special treatment.
"You, I, everybody - we're equal before the law," he said.
The prosecutor's office would not answer questions about why Depp was not charged, citing the ongoing nature of the case.
Heard has been summonsed to appear in a Queensland court on 7 September.
In an interview last month, the 29-year-old actress said she and Depp planned to avoid Australia as much as possible in the future "thanks to certain politicians there".

snippet.title: Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986) is an American actress and model. Heard made her film debut in acclaimed sports drama Friday Night Lights, starring Billy Bob Thornton. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms.
Her breakthrough came in 2008 with roles in Never Back Down and Pineapple Express. She received the Breakthrough Award at Young Hollywood Awards. She got widespread attention after her appearance in films such as The Informers, The Stepfather, Zombieland and The Joneses. She next starred in John Carpenter's The Ward, alongside Nicolas Cage in Drive Angry, and alongside Johnny Depp in The Rum Diary, for which she won a Spotlight Award at Hollywood Film Festival. Her recent films include Paranoia, Machete Kills and 3 Days to Kill.
Regarded as a sex symbol, Heard often appears in magazines' Most Beautiful and Sexiest lists. She is also involved in social activism for causes such as LGBT rights and abolishing slavery, and is a supporter of Habitat for Humanity, Girl Up United Nations Foundation, The Art of Elysium and Amnesty International.
While in Los Angeles, Heard made appearances in several TV shows and two music videos, Kenny Chesney's "There Goes My Life" and Eisley's "I Wasn't Prepared". She was cast as Liz in the pilot episode of The WB's Jack & Bobby (2004), as Riley in an episode of The Mountain (2004) and she had a brief cameo as a salesgirl in The O.C. (2005). Her first movie role was Maria in Friday Night Lights (2004), starring Billy Bob Thornton. Based on actual events, the movie was both a commercial and critical success. She next starred as Shay in Side FX (2005), an independent horror film, and had supporting roles in Drop Dead Sexy (2005), Price to Pay (2006) and You Are Here (2006). Heard had a more prominent role in Niki Caro's North Country (2005), in which she played the teenage version of Josey, Charlize Theron's character. She also appeared in a minor role in Nick Cassavetes' Alpha Dog (2006). In the same year, she starred in an episode of Criminal Minds as Lila Archer, a love interest of main character Spencer Reid.
Heard was next cast in the CW's Hidden Palms. On the show she portrayed Greta Matthews, who suffered the losses of both her mother and boyfriend, Eddie, and befriends Johnny, the antihero of the show. In order to get the part, Heard was asked to lose weight. It took her four months between the pilot and the second episode to lose 25 pounds, giving up alcohol, increasing her workouts and following a macrobiotic diet (no meat, dairy or processed sugar). Hidden Palms premiered in the US on May 30, 2007. Ultimately, the CW wrapped the summer series early; instead of the initial 12-episode arc, only 8 were aired. The show ended on July 4, 2007 two weeks earlier than originally planned.
She was cast in the title role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane, a horror film that premiered at the Toronto Film Festival in September 2006. The film immediately garnered attention and a deal was secured with Harvey Weinstein. However, nearly a year after its Toronto début, the movie had not reached theaters. In July 2007, Mandy Lane found a new distribution home and the film finally was released in 2008 with a February UK release and June DVD release. The film's director Jonathan Levine said about Amber's casting in the title role that "there was a certain type of beauty and a certain type of innate intelligence that Amber brought to it that is not something you find every day. Certainly, not something you would find in somebody her age. The wisdom she projects, I thought was pretty remarkable." The Los Angeles Times praised's Heard's acting, saying it's her most "definitive [performance] to date." and The Washington Post stated that Heard gave a "psychologically interesting performance."
In 2007, Heard also appeared in the 16-minute-long short movie Day 73 with Sarah and Jess Manafort's indie drama Remember the Daze (aka The Beautiful Ordinary), which premiered at the 2007 Los Angeles Film Festival.[20] She then appeared in the Judd Apatow-produced comedy Pineapple Express and the martial arts drama Never Back Down, both of which were released in 2008. Both films were box office successes and brought Heard into mainstream attention, including a win for Breakthrough Award in Hollywood Film Festival. Richard Roeper praised Heard's performance in Pineapple Express.
Heard also made a brief appearance in Showtime's Californication and joined the ensemble cast of 2009's The Informers, based on the Bret Easton Ellis novel of the same title. She also filmed the horror film The Stepfather and the comedy film Ex-Terminators back-to-back in 2008 while promoting Never Back Down, Mandy Lane and Remember the Daze.


Source : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amber_Heard & Google image.

snippet.title: #WarOnTerrier: Johnny Depp’s dogs given 72 hours to live by Australian authorities - TomoNews
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp is in trouble with the authorities in Australia after he and his wife Amber Heard smuggled their dogs into the country via their private jet without declaring them to customs.

Australian authorities were alerted to the presence of the Yorkshire terriers — Pistol and Boo — after Depp had them taken to a Gold Coast pet salon. Agricultural Minister Barnaby Joyce gave Depp and Heard 72 hours to have their dogs flown back to the U.S. or said they would be put to sleep.

Depp, who is currently filming the fifth installment of Pirates of the Caribbean, declined to comment. Filming was disrupted in March when Depp accidentally slashed his hand open on a glass door, requiring him to return to the U.S. for surgery.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp, Amber Heard Marry, Exchange Vows on Beach in Bahamas: Wedding Ceremony Details  Read mo
snippet.description:
epp is wed -- again! Days after Johnny Depp and Amber Heard tied the knot at home, the couple wed (yet again!) in a beautiful beach ceremony in the Bahamas on Sunday, Feb. 8, sources confirm to Us Weekly.
The ceremony took place in a small cove on a white sand beach, with a few dozen chairs set up on both sides of an aisle that trailed down to the altar which included the ocean as a backdrop.
PHOTOS: Secret celeb weddings
According to one insider, actor/director Paul Bettany was there to witness the stars exchange vows. Depp's two children, daughter Lily-Rose, 15, and son Jack, 12, whom he shares with ex Vanessa Paradis, were there to see their dad get hitched.
PHOTOS: Celeb weddings in 2014
For most of the weekend, guests hung out on the beach, drank, played music, went snorkeling, and enjoyed the private affair.
The source tells Us that the wedding was on the "smaller side" and more intimate than the couple's star-studded engagement party last March, which was attended by Mandy Moore, Steven Tyler, and Marilyn Manson.
PHOTOS: How these celeb couples first m
snippet.tags: ['Johnny Depp and Amber Heard married again in the Bahamas this past weekend in a beach ceremony', 'sources confirm to Us Weekly -- get the scoop here']

snippet.title: Amber Heard & Andie MacDowell - Magic Mike XXL Interview HD
snippet.description:
Amber Heard & Andie MacDowell - Magic Mike XXL Interview HD

Amber Heard and Andie MacDowell talk about their characters and what drew them to want to play roles in 'Magic Mike XXL.' The two actresses openly discuss the importance of women in society and the rights they should have.

Magic Mike XXL movie synopsis:

Three years after Mike (Channing Tatum) retired from stripping, he bumps into his former Kings of Tampa friends, who appear burned out from performing.

Ken (Matt Bomer), Big Dick Richie (Joe Manganiello) and Tito (Adam Rodriguez) collectively decide to throw in the towel and leave Myrtle Beach with a bang. While on the road to their final shows in Jacksonville and Savannah, the crew reunites with old friends, pick up a few new girls and a few new dance moves along the way. 

Starring: Channing Tatum, Matt Bomer, Joe Manganiello, Adam Rodriguez, Steven 'tWitch' Boss, Amber Heard, Andie MacDowell, Donald Glover, Jada Pinkett Smith, Kevin Nash

In theatres: July 1, 2015

Magic Mike XXL movie info: http://www.tribute.ca/movies/magic-mike-xxl/106810/
Amber Heard bio and filmography: http://www.tribute.ca/people/amber-heard/20600/
Andie MacDowell bio and filmography: http://www.tribute.ca/people/andie-macdowell/2149/

snippet.title: Just married! Johnny Depp, 51, and Amber Heard, 28
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are married, People reports.

The site claims that the pair - who got engaged in December 2012 - tied the knot at their home in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

They are expected to stage a bigger ceremony on the actor's private island Little Hall's Pond Cay in the Bahamas this weekend. 

PageSix has reported that the guest list will be a modest 50 people at the Bahamas ceremony, and that Amber will wear a dress by Stella McCartney.

Another source reported by E! recently revealed that Johnny, 51, who has two children, Lily-Rose, 15, and Jack, 12, with ex-girlfriend Vanessa Paradis, couldn't wait to make Amber, 28, his wife.

The source said: 'He's completely in love and can't wait!'.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp, Amber Heard are married
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are married, according to reports out Wednesday.

The civil ceremony went down at his West Hollywood home, sources told People, E! News and Us Weekly.


Much like Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie -- who got married legally in California before having another ceremony overseas -- Depp and Heard will reportedly be walking down the aisle in style this coming weekend on an island he owns in the Bahamas.

snippet.title: Johnny and Amber's show of togetherness clearly aims to quash rumors that their two month marriage i
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard touched down in Brisbane Tuesday morning local time, putting on a show of unity amid rumors of marital woes just two months after they tied the knot. 
The couple were ready for their close-up as they left their private plane, walking hand-in-hand. 
Both Johnny, 51, and Amber, 28, were wearing their wedding bands, although missing from Amber's ring finger was the huge sparkler Johnny gave her on their engagement.
The sighting comes just hours after People.com claimed they were 'leading separate lives' because they hadn't been photographed together in public since their February 3 nuptials.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Just Got Married to Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Just Got Married to Amber Heard
The nuptials come ahead of a party to be held on Depp's private island in the Bahamas
Pirates of the Caribbean actor Johnny Depp tied the knot this week with Friday Night Lights actress Amber Heard in a surprise ceremony in Depp’s Los Angeles home, PEOPLE and E! Online report, just days ahead of a planned celebration on Depp’s 45-acre private island in the Bahamas.
The couple met on the set of The Rum Diary in 2010 and began dating in 2012 after Depp broke off a 14-year partnership with French singer Vanessa Paradis, the mother of the 51-year-old’s two children, Lily-Rose Melody Depp and John Christopher “Jack” Depp III.
Heard and Depp got engaged last January. This is Depp’s second marriage. He divorced his first wife, Lori Anne Allison, in the 1980s.
Last year, Depp described his 28-year-old wife on NBC’s Today show as “a Southern belle and sweet as can be, and very good for me.”

snippet.title: Australia Hates Amber Heard Watch Now!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard and Johnny Depp’s dog drama escalated this week after prosecutors announced the actress has been charged with smuggling the couple’s two Yorkshire terriers into Australia in May.  Heard was charged Tuesday with two counts of illegally importing the pups, Pistol and Boo, into the country and one count of producing a false document, a spokesman for the Commonwealth Department of Public Prosecutions confirmed to PEOPLE. She has been issued a summons to appear at the Southport Magistrates Court in Queensland on Sept. 7. The importation charges could lead to a maximum penalty of 10 years in prison and a fine of $75,000. The false document charge carries a penalty of up to a year in prison and a fine of $7,500.

snippet.title: Australia charges Johnny Depp’s wife over smuggled dogs
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp’s wife, actress Amber Heard, has been charged for illegally bringing the couple’s dogs to Australia in an incident that led to the country’s agriculture minister warning that the terriers could be euthanized.   

The Commonwealth Department of Public Prosecutions said Thursday that Heard faces two counts of illegally importing Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo into Australia and one count of producing a false document in May.

The charges carry maximum penalties of 10-years imprisonment and a fine of $102,000 and up to one-year imprisonment and a fine of $10,200, respectively.

A summons has also been issued for her to appear before a Queensland court Sept. 7.

Agriculture Minister Barnaby Joyce told reporters Thursday that he was not concerned that legal actions against Heard could be considered mean internationally.

“No, it’s not. The law is the same for everybody,” the Australian Associated Press quoted him as saying. “There is no preferential treatment here.”

Stressing that a rabies outbreak would be catastrophic, he warned of its possible impact on Australia’s “massive” wild dog population and bat population in many towns.

“We've got enough problems with them [bats], let alone if they became rabid,” he said.

The Australian cited a Department of Agriculture spokesperson as confirming the summons issued to Heard.

“All animals entering Australia must have an import permit, and have undergone relevant testing and health checks signed off by a government veterinarian from the exporting country to ensure pests and diseases from overseas are not brought here,” she said in a statement.

The dogs had been brought into Australia while Depp was based on the Gold Coast filming Pirates of the Caribbean 5: Dead Men tell No Tales.

Australia's ports and airports have some of the toughest screening measures in the world. The country has extremely tight biosecurity laws, given that much of its flora and fauna is unique, and some have no resistance to foreign disease or bacteria. 

The quarantining of dogs is enforced very strictly as some have been found to carry rabies. The minimum period for animals entering Australia is 10 days.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Doesn't Want to Be Defined By Her Bisexuality
snippet.description:
Amber, Heard ,keeps, it, sexy, in, a ,sheer, top, while ,grabbing dinner, at ,Roka restaurant ,on, Monday ,(June 29) ,in ,London, England.

The 29-year-old actress was joined for the dinner outing by her Magic Mike XXL co-stars Matt Bomer, Joe Manganiello, and Channing Tatum, who brought his wife Jenna Dewan.

Earlier in the day, Amber and co-star Jada Pinkett Smith were spotted separately in London.

Amber recently chatted about coming out as bisexual while working in Hollywood.

“I didn’t know of anyone else in my position who was a working female lead actress. I don’t want to have to deny my sexuality in order to be me. But I don’t want to have to be defined by it. I’m fundamentally opposed to trying to edit myself to be palatable or popular. I don’t give a f–k. I fight, but I shouldn’t have to,” Amber shared to The Times.

She added, “I personally think that if you deny something or if you hide something you’re inadvertently admitting it’s wrong. I hate the idea of a label just as much as anyone else but I’m with who I’m with.”

50+ pictures inside of Amber Heard heading out to dinner in London…



Read more: http://www.justjared.com/page/2/#ixzz3eXwdna6m

snippet.title: Amber Heard at Tribeca Film Festival for "The Adderall Diaries"
snippet.description:
Based on the bestselling memoir by Stephen Elliott, The Adderall Diaries is the story of an author (James Franco) paralyzed by writer's block and an escalating drug dependency who is sucked down the rabbit hole of a high-profile murder case. As Elliott becomes increasingly obsessed with the trial his own nightmarish childhood memories resurface, particularly of his cruel and distant father (Ed Harris). But when his estranged father returns with his own story to tell, fact and fiction become blurred in an amphetamine-induced haze.

Featuring supporting performances by Amber Heard, Cynthia Nixon, and Christian Slater, Pamela Romanowsky's first feature is an unflinchingly honest drama about fathers and sons, what it means to tell the truth, and the way we choose to write our own story.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard held a second wedding ceremony on his island
snippet.description:
The couple exchanged vows under a white marquee decorated with white flowers, smiling and gazing into each other's eyes as guests looked on.

Amber wore a long-sleeved white vintage wedding gown and veil that fell to the floor. Johnny was dressed in a white tuxedo jacket and black trousers, as was his 12-year-old son Jack, who was reportedly his best man. The star's 15-year-old daughter Lily Rose was also in attendance.

The bride was flanked by a number of bridesmaids, who wore blush-coloured gowns and white heels, which they kicked off to walk in the sand, E! Online reports.

After the ceremony, which lasted around 30 minutes, guests gathered in a pavilion set back from the beach for drinks with the happy couple.

snippet.title: Report: Johnny Depp to Marry Amber Heard in Bahamas
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp, 51, and Amber Heard, 28, are reportedly going to tie the knot soon. Rumor has it, the "Mortdecai" actor and his beautiful fiancee will exchange wedding vows at his private island Little Hall's Pond Cay in the Bahamas over the February 7-8 weekend. The bride is expected to wear a Stella McCartney dress. 

According to New York Post, Depp's two children from his previous relationship with Vanessa Paradis, Lily Rose and Jack, will be in attendance. Some of the guests will reportedly stay at his yacht "Vajoliroja" which name contains the first two letters of Paradis' and Deep's first names as well as their kids'.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard held hands as they arrived in Brisbane, Australia, on Tuesday morning lo
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard touched down in Brisbane Tuesday morning local time, putting on a show of unity amid rumors of marital woes just two months after they tied the knot. 
The couple were ready for their close-up as they left their private plane, walking hand-in-hand. 
Both Johnny, 51, and Amber, 28, were wearing their wedding bands, although missing from Amber's ring finger was the huge sparkler Johnny gave her on their engagement.
The sighting comes just hours after People.com claimed they were 'leading separate lives' because they hadn't been photographed together in public since their February 3 nuptials.

snippet.description:
Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Hold Hands For Australian Arrival

Johnny Depp and his wife Amber Heard walk hand in hand while arriving on a private jet at Brisbane Airport on Monday (April 20) in Australia.

The 51-year-old actor is back in town to continue shooting his highly anticipated film Pirates of the Caribbean 5, which hits theaters on July 7, 2017.

If you don’t remember, Johnny had to take off some time away from shooting after he suffered a hand injury last month.

snippet.title: Esposa de Johnny Depp enfrentará cargos legales en Australia / Loft Cinema
snippet.description:
La actriz estadounidense Amber Heard, esposa de Johnny Depp, comparecerá ante la justicia australiana en septiembre próximo, tras ser acusada de la entrada ilegal en el país de sus dos perros, informan hoy medios locales.

La Fiscalía Pública de Australia acusó a Heard de dos cargos vinculados a la importación ilegal de animales contraviniendo la Ley de Cuarentena y producción de documentación falsa, según la cadena local ABC.


16 de julio 2015

snippet.title: Amber Heard y Johnny Depp, muy enamorados en el estreno de "La chica danesa"
snippet.description:
El estreno de la película "La chica danesa" ha servido como termómetro de amor para la pareja de Amber Heard y Johnny Depp. El actor acompañaba a su chica a la premiere donde ella es protagonista y así cogidos de la mano, posaron ante los flashes con beso incluido. Después le tocó el turno a ella y Johnny aprovechó a inmortalizar su momento de gloria ante la sorpresa de los fotógrafos.

Aunque él ha sido criticado por su constante desaliño en el vestir, ella sin embargo ha recibido grandes elogios. Supo lucir así de bien este traje masculino de Dolce&Gabbana al que dio su toque personal con salones de vértigo y recogido impecable. 
Otro de los triunfadores de la noche fue su protagonista, Eddie Redmayne, claro candidato al oscar por su papel en "La chica danesa". El joven actor interpreta a la primera persona de la historia que se sometió a una operación de cambio de sexo. 

Entre todas las estrellas, Alicia Vikander brilló junto a sus compañeros al lado de Tom Hooper, el director de "El discurso del rey", que sorprende ahora con esta nueva historia. En la alfombra roja todos ellos dan sus primeros pasos en la carrera hacia los oscar.
-----------------------------------
Visítenos en www.celebmas.com

snippet.title: Amber Heard Debuts Wedding Band at London Fashion Event (PHOTO)
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Debuts Wedding Band at London Fashion Event Videos
Heard is now sporting a thick gold band with her vintage diamond engagement ring, and it totally fits her eclectic, hipster style.

For her beach wedding, the 28-year-old, wore a traditional long-sleeve white gown and a floor-length veil, while Depp, 51, chose a white tuxedo jacket and black pants. And now we’re wondering if Heard’s gorgeous design was created by her pal Alice Temperley.

RELATED PHOTOS: Get all the latest on celebrity wedding style

“The weather was perfect and the beach setting was gorgeous,” a source told PEOPLE of the special day, which took place on Depp’s private island in the Bahamas, Little Hall’s Pond Cay. “The ceremony was beach casual and intimate, yet very romantic.”

What do you think of her wedding band? Do you like the mixed-metal look? Share your thoughts below.

snippet.title: Na Rodagem de Magic Mike XXL
snippet.description:
Magic Mike XXL

Realizado por Gregory Jacobs
Com Channing Tatum, Elizabeth Banks, Matt Bomer, Amber  Heard, Jada Pinkett Smith e Andie MacDowell.

Este verão, eles estão de volta ao serviço.

Sinopse:
Três anos depois de Mike ter abandonado a vida de stripper quando ainda estava no topo, “Magic Mike XXL” encontra os restantes elementos dos Kings of Tampa, também eles prontos para se afastarem das luzes do palco. Mas eles querem fazê-lo à maneira deles: deitar a casa abaixo com uma última e bombástica atuação em Myrtle Beach, com o lendário Magic Mike a partilhar o palco com eles. Na estrada a caminho do seu último espetáculo, com paragens em Jacksonville e Savannah para rever velhos amigos e fazer novos, Mike e os rapazes aprendem novos passos e ultrapassam-se de uma forma surpreendente.

2 de julho 2015 nos cinemas

snippet.title: Magic Mike XXL - TV Spot "Resistir" 30''
snippet.description:
Magic Mike XXL

Realizado por Gregory Jacobs
Com Channing Tatum, Elizabeth Banks, Matt Bomer, Amber  Heard, Jada Pinkett Smith e Andie MacDowell.

Este verão, eles estão de volta ao serviço.

Sinopse:
Três anos depois de Mike ter abandonado a vida de stripper quando ainda estava no topo, “Magic Mike XXL” encontra os restantes elementos dos Kings of Tampa, também eles prontos para se afastarem das luzes do palco. Mas eles querem fazê-lo à maneira deles: deitar a casa abaixo com uma última e bombástica atuação em Myrtle Beach, com o lendário Magic Mike a partilhar o palco com eles. Na estrada a caminho do seu último espetáculo, com paragens em Jacksonville e Savannah para rever velhos amigos e fazer novos, Mike e os rapazes aprendem novos passos e ultrapassam-se de uma forma surpreendente.

2 de julho 2015 nos cinemas

snippet.title: Amber Heard Does Magic Mike Watch Now
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Does Magic Mike Watch Now
Here’s Amber Heard at the Magic Mike XXL premiere in LA, and you know, we haven’t seen much of Amber ever since she got hitched to that lucky bastard Johnny Depp. Which is weird, because I thought marrying a movie star was supposed to help her career. Guess not. But the good news is it’s not too late for Amber to turn things around, and divorce him for a pasty blogger who lives in his mom’s basement. I’m telling you, that’s guaranteed to get her more attention. Frankly, I’m a little surprised her agent hasn’t already called me. But better late than never, I guess.

snippet.title: Magic Mike XXL em exclusivo na SIC
snippet.description:
Magic Mike XXL

Realizado por Gregory Jacobs
Com Channing Tatum, Elizabeth Banks, Matt Bomer, Amber  Heard, Jada Pinkett Smith e Andie MacDowell.

Este verão, eles estão de volta ao serviço.

Sinopse:
Três anos depois de Mike ter abandonado a vida de stripper quando ainda estava no topo, “Magic Mike XXL” encontra os restantes elementos dos Kings of Tampa, também eles prontos para se afastarem das luzes do palco. Mas eles querem fazê-lo à maneira deles: deitar a casa abaixo com uma última e bombástica atuação em Myrtle Beach, com o lendário Magic Mike a partilhar o palco com eles. Na estrada a caminho do seu último espetáculo, com paragens em Jacksonville e Savannah para rever velhos amigos e fazer novos, Mike e os rapazes aprendem novos passos e ultrapassam-se de uma forma surpreendente.

2 de julho 2015 nos cinemas

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Tie the Knot - TOI
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Tie the Knot


Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are married! The lavish island wedding is still to come, but People reports that The Rum Diary co-stars made it official Tuesday, marrying each other at their home in Los Angeles. People reports that Depp, 51, and Heard, 28, signed the papers to become man and wife in advance of their ceremony this weekend on Depp's private island in the Bahamas.

snippet.title: Mariage imminent pour Johnnny Depp et Amber Heard
snippet.description: Johnny Depp et Amber Heard devraient se marier dans une semaine. C'est le "New York Post", généralement bien informé, qui l'annonce dans sa célèbre "Page Six" en donnant pas mal de détails. L'acteur de 51 ans et sa fiancée de 28 ans devraient se dire Oui le week-end des 7 et 8 février sur Little Hall's Pond Cay, l'île privée de la star de "Pirates des Caraïbes" aux Bahamas. Ce sera une cérémonie intime avec pas plus d'une cinquantaine d'invités. Amber Heard portera une robe confectionnée par la styliste Stella McCartney. Johnny Depp et la jeune actrice se sont rencontrés en 2011 et fiancés l'année dernière. L'annonce de ce mariage coupe court aux rumeurs de tensions à l'intérieur du couple relayées par la presse people ces dernières semaines.

snippet.title: Charlize Theron, Sean Penn, Johnny Depp, Amber Heard, more on Met Gala carpet
snippet.description:
(6 May 2014) OLD-WORLD GLAMOUR IN BLACK AND WHITE AT MET GALA
Old-style glamour - especially in black and white - ruled the night air as stars of Hollywood and the fashion world converged on the Metropolitan Museum of Art on Monday 
(5 MAY 2014) evening for the annual Costume Institute gala, the biggest event on the New York fashion calendar.
This year, the glamour quotient was raised a notch: Whereas last year's theme was punk, this time women were focusing on flowing gowns, and men were asked to dress in white tie - full evening dress, including tails, in other words. A few men even brought along their top hats.
The white-tie request - or rather, suggestion, some said - was in keeping with the theme of this year's Costume Institute exhibit, which opens to the public on Thursday: "Charles James: Beyond Fashion." James, who died in 1978, was a mid-20th century designer who specialized in spectacular, sculptured gowns made with intricate draping techniques. It's the inaugural exhibit of the new, $40 million Anna Wintour Costume Center, named for the Vogue editor.
Among the early arrivals, actress Sarah Jessica Parker zeroed right in on the theme of James-like glamour, wearing a sumptuous Oscar de la Renta ball gown with a black bodice and flowing white skirt, with a gridlike pattern on the back. In a dramatic flourish, the back hem of the skirt was emblazoned with the designer's name.
Also striking in black and white was actress Charlize Theron, in a white Dior gown with black ribbon-like vertical stripes. She was accompanied by her high-profile boyfriend, Sean Penn.
Other guests in black and white: Actress Anna Kendrick in J. Mendel, and Hailee Steinfeld in Prabal Gurung, who seemed to be evoking James' classic 1953 Clover dress, a study in black-and-white chic - and sophisticated engineering.
Parker's outfit, worn with white elbow-length gloves and her hair piled high on her head, seemed to be a sure-fire hit with fashionistas. Another, newer fashion star, Oscar-winning actress Lupita Nyong'o, seemed to divide fans: She wore a short shift covered by a beaded and feathered overlay in bright green, with a matching headband and a bright green clutch, too. It looked vaguely flapper-inspired, perhaps a tribute to James' early years.
Giving off an entirely different vibe was comedian Sarah Silverman in a deep maroon-red Zac Posen gown, evoking a famous Cecil Beaton photo of James' outfits, and also the voluminous folds of his "Umbrella" gown. Posen spoke earlier in the day about how he'd been influenced by James throughout his career - the couturier's gowns, he said, exude "a deep love and passion for the sculpture of the human body."
Men interpreted the white tie in a number of ways. Though technically it involves a black jacket with tails, Jay Z, for example, chose a white tuxedo jacket, sans tails, by Givenchy. His much-scrutinized spouse - Beyonce, of course - was striking in a dark, sheer, sparkling Givenchy ensemble.
Wearing midnight blue, Kim Kardashian,  walked the red carpet in Lanvin with a very high slit in front, accompanied by her beau, Kanye West.
Actress Idina Menzel evoked her recent success voicing the movie "Frozen" with an icy all-white white concoction with a feathery train by Donna Karan Atelier. Also in all white: Rihanna, in a sleek, midriff-baring McCartney design. Right behind her on the red carpet was Kate Bosworth in pale pink McCartney. Also in pale pink: Taylor Swift, in a de la Renta floor-length sheath with a train. (Trains were huge on this night.)

Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AP_Archive 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/APArchives ​​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/APNews/


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/90033d2bf500a4dc824500dfdc072803

Magic Mike XXL (2015)
Picking up the story three years after Mike (Channing Tatum) bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, “Magic Mike XXL” finds the remaining Kings of Tampa likewise ready to throw in the towel. But they want to do it their way: burning down the house in one last blow-out performance in Myrtle Beach, and with legendary headliner Magic Mike sharing the spotlight with them. On the road to their final show, with whistle stops in Jacksonville and Savannah to renew old acquaintances and make new friends, Mike and the guys learn some new moves and shake off the past in surprising ways.

Official Website: magicmikemovie.com

Starring: Amber Heard, Channing Tatum, Elizabeth Banks, Matthew Bomer, Joe Manganiello, Jada Pinkett Smith, Andie MacDowell, Donald Glover, Kevin Nash, Adam Rodriguez, Gabriel Iglesias, Stephen Boss, Michael Strahan, Haviland Stillwell, Raeden Greer, Crystal Hunt, Jane McNeill, Rhoda Griffis, Judi Blair, Brandon Cyrus

Directed By: Gregory Jacobs

Written By: Reid Carolin, Channing Tatum

In theaters: July 1st, 2015

snippet.title: London Fields Clip Featuring Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Ahead of its world premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival on Friday, September 18, the first clip from London Fields has been revealed.

London Fields unfolds as a pulpy, stylistic, noir mystery set in the not so distant future where the world is in turmoil. Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six (Amber Heard) lives with a dark premonition of her impending murder. She spins a tangled web of deceit and passion, drawing in three uniquely different men played by Billy Bob Thornton, Theo James and Jim Sturgess, one of which she believes to be her killer. Jason Isaacs, Cara Delevingne, and Jaimie Alexander also star. 

Grammy and MTV Video Music Award-winning director Mathew Cullen channels the best of Terry Gilliam, Robert Rodriguez and Frank Miller in his feature film debut that invites audiences to enter a visually stunning, dystopian world. The film features a pumping soundtrack with music by Toydrum, Grinderman and London Grammar.

Reminiscent of films such as Sin City and Pulp Fiction, London Fields explores the themes of love and control in this deadly psycho sexual tale where infatuation has consequences and, in a world dominated by men, Nicola Six holds all the power. Chris Hanley (Spring Breakers, American Psycho), Jordan Gertner and Geyer Kosinski produced the film.

The film was written by Roberta Hanley and Martin Amis, based on Martin Amis’ best-selling novel.

snippet.title: Amber Digby  If Anyone Ought To Know
snippet.description:
When Amber Digby sings, people listen.  “Amber is a great traditional singer,” says Vince Gill, who knows whereof he speaks, and like his following observation—“which is so hard to find these days”—it’s just the simple truth.

Yet it also doesn’t do his subject real justice, because Amber Digby’s singing touches the heart, not just of anyone who appreciatse a traditional country song, but of anyone who’s ever known heartbreak, happiness, regret, loneliness—or just the compelling desire to get out on the dance floor for a night of fun.  And the fact is, with each passing month and year, as she enjoys growing airplay and tours farther and farther from her home in Texas, Amber Digby and her music are reaching out to more and more and more of those hearts.

To an outside observer, Digby’s career has an appearance of inevitability—after all, her father, mother, stepfather and uncles have all been in the ranks of professional musicians, notable for their own careers or for their contributions to the music of Loretta Lynn, Connie Smith, Faron Young, Ronnie Milsap, Hank Williams, Jr., the Osborne Brothers and many more.  But though she frequented the wings of the Grand Ole Opry House and the sets of Hee Haw and Nashville Now as a child watching her parents at work, singing “was just something I did,” she says with a laugh.  “My mom and my dad and my stepdad encouraged me to find my path and to be creative—not necessarily to sing.”  

Indeed, it wasn’t until she was in her mid-teens and living in Oklahoma that Amber even began to sit in with her stepfather’s band, much less think about music as a career—and even then, it wasn’t an easy road.  “I actually graduated from high school in Missouri, and then I got sidetracked, detoured,” she says with the frankness of someone who’s been through what she calls rough times.  “I made some bad choices, and really, the only good thing that came out of that five year block was my son.”

That, though, turns out not to be quite true, because in the midst of that turmoil, Digby began visiting her mother and stepfather in their new home in the Texas hill country—and before long, she’d made her first album.  “I started sitting in with artists like Jake Hooker and Justin Trevino,” she recalls, and once I heard what all these guys were doing down there, I thought yeah, this is really different—and it’s really good!”   

With Trevino producing and playing on the album, her stepfather on pedal steel and Bobby Flores on fiddle, Music From The Honky Tonks served notice of a major new talent—and though it took a while to reach more than a few ears, it began to make the young singer a reputation.  As country music historian John Morthland wrote in No Depression in early 2005, not long after she finally made the move to Texas, “if there’s a more promising hard-country singer on the horizon than Amber Digby, I’ve been kept in the dark.”  By that summer, the album had garnered enough attention in Europe that she got called to go with Trevino and Flores to Sweden—the first of many overseas visits she’d make.  

Reuniting in the studio with Trevino, Amber released Here Come The Teardrops for Heart Of Texas Records in 2006, and traveled to Europe again—this time headlining her own tour—and by early 2007, she’d quit her day job, moved to the Houston area and, with the help of future husband Randy Lindley, had put together her own band to play the dance hall and club circuits that have nurtured so many Texas country artists.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Sparks Amber Heard Wedding Rumors After Spotted With New Ring
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has sparked marriage rumors with his fiancee Amber Heard. Johnny was spotted wearing a new gold band on his left ring finger when he attended the premiere of his new flick "Mortdecai" in Los Angeles on Wednesday, January 21. 

Johnny and Amber were recently rocked by split rumors. However earlier this month, the couple shot the rumors down by sharing an affectionate kiss at the 8th Annual Heaven Gala presented by The Art of Elysium and Samsung in Los Angeles. 

Back in April, Johnny confirmed his engagement to Amber when promoting his movie "Transcendence" in Beijing. He said he was wearing a woman's engagement ring on his left ring finger. "The fact that I'm wearing a chick's ring on my finger is probably a dead giveaway," he shared, "Not very subtle."

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Continue Their Red Carpet Grand Slam at The Danish Girl TIFF Premiere
snippet.description:
Amber Heard and Johnny Depp are the definition of Hollywood glamour.

The coupled dazzled on the red carpet for the premiere of The Danish Girl on Saturday at the Toronto International Film Festival. They walked the carpet hand in hand, posing for pictures together along the way.

Heard looked stunning in a glittering gold-and-taupe gown with metallic embellishments. The 29-year-old actress left her hair down and wavy for the occasion and accessorized her look with gold jewelry.

Depp, 52, complemented the earth tones of his wife's dress in a brown pin-stripped suit. Keeping to his signature style, he donned a gray fedora hat, sunglasses and layered pendant necklaces.

Keep up with Johnny Depp in the pages of PEOPLE Magazine by subscribing now.

snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard and Johnny Depp are the definition of Hollywood glamour.

The coupled dazzled on the red carpet for the premiere of The Danish Girl on Saturday at the Toronto International Film Festival. They walked the carpet hand in hand, posing for pictures together along the way.

Heard looked stunning in a glittering gold-and-taupe gown with metallic embellishments. The 29-year-old actress left her hair down and wavy for the occasion and accessorized her look with gold jewelry.

Depp, 52, complemented the earth tones of his wife's dress in a brown pin-stripped suit. Keeping to his signature style, he donned a gray fedora hat, sunglasses and layered pendant necklaces.

Keep up with Johnny Depp in the pages of PEOPLE Magazine by subscribing now.

snippet.title: Amber Heard and Andie MacDowell interview Magic Mike XXL
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Interview

Andie MacDowell Interview   

Magic Mike XXL Interview

Segment Producer Shawn Edwards

Segment Editor   Jalen Coleman

The filmmakers also amped up the volume with new characters that introduce unexpected challenges and directions. Amber Heard is the elusive Zoe, a photographer who catches Mike’s eye; Andie MacDowell is Nancy, an uninhibited Southern Belle who might have something BDR had given up hope of ever finding; Elizabeth Banks is Paris, who must be convinced to allow them a place on the convention bill; and Jada Pinkett Smith is Rome, a woman from Mike’s past.

As the festivities spill over into a beach party, illuminated mainly by car headlights, Mike has his first of several chance meetings with Amber Heard’s Zoe. An intriguing young woman with a flair for candid photography, Zoe is someone he’d like to learn more about, but, for the moment, she gives him only a smile and something to think about. “What I like about the way these two interact is that they don’t follow a traditional trajectory of ‘boy meets girl, boy chases girl,’” Heard observes of their keep-‘em-guessing interplay. “It’s not about that. We get the impression that they have something to impart to each other which is not possible in their first meeting, though they’re drawn to each other.”
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Amber Heard Interview', 'Andie Macdowell', 'Magic Mike XXL']

snippet.title: Chicony KB-5161C review (Amber Omron B3G-S)
snippet.description:
Skip to 6:45 for a typing demonstration.

Chicony KB-5162F review REDUX: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vpawdi_pR-w

A review of my 5161C keyboard(s). I had to take one apart to make one fully functioning board because both had a huge amount of dysfunctional switches. The switches are fun to use and hysterically loud, but do have several design limitations. Fun to use, but not the most practical. 

The practice sentence was: "Hello my name is Thomas adn I'm typing on a Chicony KB-5161C right now. If it can't possibly be clicky enough, get one of these, it's the closest sound I've heard so far to a classic typewriter. WEEEEEEEE!"

snippet.title: "Black Mass Red Carpet" with Johnny Depp, Amber Heard and Dakota Johnson
snippet.description:
Things got a little crazy at the world premiere of Johnny Depp's new gangster film, Black Mass, as he hit the red carpet with wife Amber Heard and Dakota Johnson.

Johnny Depp-starrer “Black Mass” world-premiered to positive response Friday at the Venice Film Festival where a relaxed Depp held court, musing on the challenges of playing Boston gangster James “Whitey” Bulger naturalistically, including a dramatically receding hairline, and how he feels risky physical transformations are part of his duty to give audiences “something new each time.” Director Scott Cooper’s biopic of Bulger, who became an FBI informant and used this status to eliminate criminal competition during the 1970s, ’80s and early ’90s, was greeted with applause at the Venice press screening and the press conference was packed to the rafters.

Depp downplayed the purely criminal component of Bulger, whom he described as an man of “very proud Irish immigrant stock, who was loyal to his neighborhood.”

snippet.title: Johnny Depp et Amber Heard déjà mariés
snippet.description: La presse annonçait une noce pour ce week-end, elle a été prise de court. Selon "People", Johnny Depp et Amber Heard sont déjà mariés. La star de 51 ans et la jeune actrice de 28 ans se sont dit "Oui" avant-hier chez eux, dans leur propriété de Los Angeles. Une cérémonie civile dans la plus stricte intimité. Il y aura quand même une fête samedi et dimanche à Little Hall’s Pond Cay, l'île privée que le héros de "Pirates des Caraïbes" possède aux Bahamas. On attend une cinquantaine de personnes, dont Lily Rose et Jack, les enfants que Johnny Depp a eus avec Vanessa Paradis. Amber portera une robe signée Stella McCartney.

snippet.title: Amber Heard's 'When I Live My Life Over Again' Will Hit Tribeca Film Festival 2015
snippet.description:
Amber Heard's 'When I Live My Life Over Again' Will Hit Tribeca Film Festival 2015

Amber Heard keeps it stylish while doing some shopping on Wednesday (April 15) in New York City.

The 28-year-old actress was seen buying a Howlin’ Wolf album from a record store during the outing.

Amber‘s upcoming film When I Live My Life Over Again is set to premiere during the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival, which is just about to kick off.

Amber plays the role of a “struggling singer-songwriter who escapes to the Hamptons home of her father (Christopher Walken), an over-the-hill crooner desperately charting his own musical comeback.”

snippet.title: Mansfield parents in plea for missing Amber Peat
snippet.description:
The parents of a 13-year-old girl who has been missing for nearly three days have pleaded with her to get in touch.

Amber Peat was last seen at home in Mansfield in Nottinghamshire at 17:30 BST on Saturday.

At a press conference, her mother and stepfather said Amber's disappearance, from her home in Bosworth Street, was "completely out of character".

Fighting back tears, Kelly and Danny Peat said: "We just want to know she is okay."

Up to 300 people were involved in a search for Amber on Monday, with posters being placed in many houses and shops.
'Brilliant holiday'

"We just want her, or someone who knows where she is, to get in touch," Mr and Mrs Peat added.

Supt Matthew McFarlane, of Nottinghamshire Police, said they had had few leads in the inquiry, but a "full-scale effort" to find her was under way.

Mr Peat said: "We had just all had a brilliant holiday. It's just not right.

She had a fantastic time, never stopped laughing with all of us together."

Mrs Peat said "nothing else happened" that would lead to Amber leaving, apart from a disagreement over chores.
'No confirmed sightings'

She added: "I was upstairs and I heard a door bang.

"I went downstairs and she wasn't around, so I looked outside and she was nowhere."

They confirmed Amber had left without her mobile phone or any money.

Supt McFarlane said: "We've been involved in searching the area, and friends and family have also assisted with that.

"We've been speaking to all of her friends, all the inquiries through the school, through family, through anybody who may possibly know or have heard from her over the last three days.

"Unfortunately, we're here today because we have not had any confirmed sightings of her."

The cast and crew of 'The Danish Girl', including director Tom Hooper and stars Eddie Redmayne, Amber Heard, Matthias Schoenaerts and Alicia Vikander, visited Venice for Venice Film Festival this week. 
Video courtesy of UPI Media/Universal.
contentDetails.caption: False

snippet.title: Round Two! Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Pack on the PDA While Walking the Red Carpet for The DanVideo
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and wife Amber Heard got super affectionate while walking the red carpet together for the premiere of her film The Danish Girl at the 2015 Venice Film Festival on Saturday. 

The pair packed on the PDA as they posed for photographers, and even shared a romantic smooch. 

Heard, 29, and Depp, 52, were the picture of Hollywood glamor in complimentary looks. The actor wore a black tuxedo, while Heard donned a black floral printed, strapless gown. 

Round Two! Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Pack on the PDA While Walking the Red Carpet for The Danish Girl| Couples, Venice Film Festival, Alicia Vikander, Amber Heard, Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard at the Venice Film Festival
ELISABETTA A. VILLA / WIREIMAGE
The Danish Girl, which is already picking up rave reviews, tells the story of Lili Elbe, who was born Einar Wegener. Elbe, played by Oscar-winner Eddie Redmayne in the film, became one of the first people to undergo gender reassignment surgery. Heard portrays Oola Paulson, a ballet dancer close to Elbe's wife, played by Alicia Vikander.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp at the BFI Film Festival premiere of Black Mass
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp at the BFI Film Festival premiere of Black Mass


Amber Heard stuns in black silk dress as she outshines scruffy husband Johnny Depp at the BFI Film Festival premiere of Black Mass

They tied the knot in February after almost three years together.
And Amber Heard and Johnny Depp put on a rock solid display of affection at the BFI London Film Festival premiere of the A-list actor's mobster movie Black Mass on Sunday evening.
The 29-year-old beauty went hand-in-hand with leading man Johnny as they walked the red carpet in coordinating black ensembles, looking more united and in sync than ever.

Source: Dailymail.co.uk

snippet.title: Johnny Depp ha detto sì, nozze con Amber Heard a Los Angeles
snippet.description:
Roma, (askanews) - Johnny Depp si è sposato. Le voci sul matrimonio con la fidanzata attrice Amber Heard, a cui è legato dal 2012, si rincorrevano da mesi e l'attore dei "Pirati dei caraibi" è riuscito a mantenere quasi tutto segreto fino all'ultimo, convolando a nozze con una cerimonia civile low profile, come riporta la stampa locale, il 3 febbraio nella villa di Los Angeles dell'attore, nel quartiere di West Hollywood.
Depp, 51 anni, e la sua compagna bionda di 28, si sono conosciuti nel 2011 sul set del film "The Rum Diary" e da allora sono diventati inseparabili. Ma il loro amore è stato reso pubblico solo dopo che il divo ha annunciato la fine della sua lunga relazione con Vanessa Paradis, da cui ha avuto due figli.
Per l'eclettico interprete di Jack Sparrow quello con Amber è il secondo matrimonio. Prima della lunga love story con l'attrice e cantante francese Paradis, è stato sposato per due anni con la make up artist Lori Anne Allison.

Per l'eclettico interprete di Jack Sparrow quello con Amber è il secondo matrimonio. Prima della lunga love story con l'attrice e cantante francese Paradis, è stato sposato per due anni con la make up artist Lori Anne Allison.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding
snippet.description:
Bahamas Beach Wedding: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding - http://www.bahamas-destination-wedding.com/AskGlenn

Hi I'm Glenn Ferguson, wedding officiant in Nassau Bahamas with another spotlight on weddings in the Bahamas. Today we're featuring  Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding. 

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard chose a Bahamian island for their wedding earlier this month. The wedding was held on Little Hall’s Pond Cay, the private island owned by Depp in the Exuma Island chain.

Depp first purchased the island 11 years ago, after he first filmed Pirates of the Caribbean in the Bahamas. The 45-acre island has six private beaches and Depp is among the latest celebrities to get married in the Bahamas.

Take a look at the video and see the beauty that Johnny and Amber enjoyed at their beach wedding in the Bahamas.

And you have have questions about planning a Bahamas Beach wedding call me Glenn Ferguson, wedding officiant Nassau Bahamas at 1-(242)-327-2453 and I'll get you the help you need to experience your Beach wedding in the Bahamas.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Hides Behind Her Hair At LAX
snippet.description: Wednesday, June 24, 2015 - Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard returns to LA. Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are planning to boycott Australia following their clash with authorities after the actor brought his two dogs into the country. The Pirates of the Caribbean star was criticized by the minister for agriculture Barnaby Joyce and accused of breaking quarantine laws by bringing his pooches with him. Now, Amber has admitted the couple will be avoiding Australia and took a dig at the minister with a response, "I have a feeling we're going to avoid the land down under from now on, just as much as we can, thanks to certain politicians there."

snippet.title: Amber Heard and Johnny Depp They wed in February after three years together
snippet.description:
They wed in February after three years together, and there's certainly no shortage of passion between Amber Heard and her husband Johnny Depp.
The couple couldn't keep their hands off each other as they attended the Toronto International Film Festival premiere of Black Mass on Monday.
Amber, 29, cosied up to Johnny, planting a tender kiss on her 52-year-old partner's lips as they walked the red carpet together to promote his new film.

snippet.title: THE DANISH GIRL Trailer Deutsch German - Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander, Ben Wishaw, Amber Heard
snippet.description:
THE DANISH GIRL Trailer Deutsch German - Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander, Ben Wishaw, Amber Heard

Kinostart: 7. Januar 2016
Filmlänge:  120 min

Regisseur: Tom Hooper
Darsteller: Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander, Ben Wishaw, Amber Heard

Es ist die auf einer wahren Begebenheit beruhenden Geschichte von Lili Wegener (Eddie Redmayne), die als Mann Einar mit Ehefrau Gerda (Alicia Vikander) ein bewegtes Künstlerleben im Kopenhagen der zwanziger Jahre lebt. Als die anfangs noch erfolglose Malerin Gerda sie schließlich bittet, als weibliches Modell zu posieren, erfahren die daraus resultierenden Portraits einen ungemeinen Anklang. Es scheint, als ob Gerda endlich die Muse gefunden hat, die sie zu ihrer wahren Meisterleistung inspiriert. Währenddessen entwickelt Lili eine ganz eigene Liebe, zu dieser anderen, neuen Seite an sich. Die Liebe zu Lili Elbe, die Frau, als die sie leben möchte. Immer mehr wächst in Lili der unbändige Wunsch heran, vollständig und damit auch körperlich künftig als Frau zu leben… Doch was bedeutet dieser Schritt für ihr gemeinsames Leben, ihre Sehnsüchte und somit auch für ihre Ehe? 
Eine Hommage an Gretas Toleranz und Lilis Mut.

Lust auf mehr?

Harry Potter - Alles was man wissen muss: http://bit.ly/1hOgbOA

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Tie the Knot: Source
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard made it legal at their home in Los Angeles on Tuesday, a source tells PEOPLE. 

As previously reported, a bigger wedding is still to come this weekend on Depp's private island (Little Hall's Pond Cay) in the Bahamas. 

Depp, 51, and Heard, 28, got engaged over the holidays in 2012 after meeting on the set of 2011's The Rum Diary. 

They stepped out as a couple in 2012 after the actor split with longtime partner Vanessa Paradis, and though they weathered split rumors late last year, the two have seemed better than ever as of late, showing off PDA at various events.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp sposa Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Mark Whalberg in Deepwater Horizon.
Elijah Wood sul set con Nicolas Cage.
Keanu Reeves e Christina Hendricks in The Neon Demon.
Chris Pratt è un Cowboy Ninja Viking.
Johnny Depp sposa Amber Heard.

Seguimi su:
www.visionair.fm
www.youtube.com/user/VISIONAIRLauraBuffa
www.facebook.com/VISIONAIRLauraBuffa
+VISIONAIR- Laura Buffa
@VISIONAIRLauraB

Benvenuti all'appuntamento con le VISIONews, le notizie dal mondo del cinema a cura di VISIONAIR.

Spazio ai nuovi progetti in questa edizione delle VISIONews. Iniziamo da Mark Whalberg che verrà diretto da Peter Berg in "Deepwater Horizon". Si tratta di un film basato sugli eventi reali accaduti durante una fuoriuscita di petrolio nel Golfo del Messico il 20 aprile del 2010. I tecnici che, in quel momento, si trovarono sulla piattaforma Deepwater Horizon riuscirono ad evitare un enorme disastro ecologico. L'uscita nelle sale americane è prevista per  il 30 settembre 2016.

Intanto sono iniziate le riprese di "The Trust". Elijah Wood ha raggiunto sul set, a Las Vegas, Nicolas Cage per ricoprire un ruolo che, all'inizio, doveva essere affidato a Jack Huston. 
L'attore ha probabilmente dovuto rinunciare alla parte in quanto è stato scritturato per il ruolo principale nell'imminente "Ben Hur". Nel film Wood e Cage vestono i panni di due poliziotti corrotti che scoprono una cassaforte nascosta mentre lavorano nella sezione del dipartimento di polizia che riguarda le prove. 

Mentre Keanu Reeves e Christina Hendricks raggiungono la protagonista, Elle Fanning, nel cast di "The Neon Demon", film horror diretto da Nicolas Winding Refn. La trama è ancora top secret. Le riprese inizieranno in marzo.

Cambiamo decisamente genere con i registi David Leitch e Chad Stahelski che sono in trattative per dirigere l’attore del momento, Chris Pratt, in "Cowboy Ninja Viking". Il film, targato Universal, è tratto dall'omonima graphic novel di A.J. Lieberman e  racconta di un uomo che soffre di un disturbo di personalità multipla e viene inserito in un programma governativo per essere trasformato in un supersoldato con le caratteristiche di un cowboy, un ninja e un vichingo.  

Per finire chiudiamo con la cronaca rosa. Matrimonio a sorpresa per Johnny Depp e Amber Heard che si sarebbero sposati con rito civile a Los Angeles. L'attrice texana nel 2010 aveva fatto coming out come bisessuale. Depp si era già sposato nell'83 con la truccatrice Anne Allison ma divorziò solo dopo due anni. L'attore ha avuto due figli con la cantante francese Vanessa Paradis.

Per il momento è tutto da Laura Buffa… ma se volete rimanere sempre aggiornati sulle novità dal mondo del cinema, venite a trovarmi sul sito www.visionair.fm. A presto e… buon cinema a tutti!

Spazio ai nuovi progetti in questa edizione delle VISIONews. Iniziamo da Mark Whalberg che verrà diretto da Peter Berg in "Deepwater Horizon". Si tratta di un film basato sugli eventi reali accaduti durante una fuoriuscita di petrolio nel Golfo del Messico il 20 aprile del 2010. I tecnici che, in quel momento, si trovarono sulla piattaforma Deepwater Horizon riuscirono ad evitare un enorme disastro ecologico. L'uscita nelle sale americane è prevista per  il 30 settembre 2016.

Intanto sono iniziate le riprese di "The Trust". Elijah Wood ha raggiunto sul set, a Las Vegas, Nicolas Cage per ricoprire un ruolo che, all'inizio, doveva essere affidato a Jack Huston.

Lieberman e  racconta di un uomo che soffre di un disturbo di personalità multipla e viene inserito in un programma governativo per essere trasformato in un supersoldato con le caratteristiche di un cowboy, un ninja e un vichingo.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard:  Dieser Auftritt war richtig spooky! - BUNTE TV
snippet.description:
Huch, was war denn da mit Johnny Depp und Amber Heard los? Bei der Premiere von „The Danish Girl“ in Los Angeles am vergangenen Samstag legten die beiden einen ziemlich fragwürdigen Auftritt hin. Aber sehen Sie selbst ...

Vor allem Johnny Depp (52) sorgte in den letzten Wochen und Monaten immer wieder für Schlagzeilen – und die waren häufig negativer Natur. Fans machen sich zu Recht Sorgen um den „Fluch der Karibik“-Star.

Die Frage, die Viele beschäftigen dürfte: Was sagt eigentlich Ehefrau Amber Heard (29) zu den Eskapaden ihres Gatten? Bisher wurde die ja häufig alleine auf roten Teppichen gesehen und machte mehr oder weniger gute Miene zum bösen Spiel. Ein seltener Anblick war daher der gemeinsame Auftritt des Hollywood-Paares bei der Premiere von „The Danish Girl“ (Deutscher Kinostart ist der 7. Januar 2016) am vergangenen Samstag in Los Angeles.

Was man von „Captain Jack Sparrow“ schon gewohnt ist, wirkte bei seiner Ehefrau umso erschreckender, denn auf dem roten Teppich zeigten sich die beiden ziemlich ... na ja sagen wir ... erschöpft. Was ist da nur los im Hause Depp/Heard?

Oben im Video zeigen wir Ihnen den Auftritt des Hollywood-Paares, der alles andere als glamourös war.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Talks Life After Marrying Johnny Depp!
snippet.description:
Please watch: "Milano Fashion Week - CAVALLI SHOW SS2017" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fMJIwEsYsk
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-

Amber Heard Talks Life After Marrying Johnny Depp!

Amber Heard shows off her svelte figure on the cover of Elle magazine’s July 2015 issue, on newsstands June 23.

Here’s what the 29-year-old actress had to share with the mag:

On life since marrying Johnny Depp: “Nothing is a dramatic change. We’ve been together for a long time now, so it’s been a fairly organic process. I have a fiercely independent spirit.”

On fame: “The thing that really scares me is the potential of losing my freedom. I never want for my life to lose the ability to transverse the world, with freedom and ease. The freedom and ease I have worked so hard to acquire for myself.”

snippet.title: Johnny Depp at Black Mass Premier 2015
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp hits the red carpet with wife Amber Heard and Dakota Johnson and other casts for his new gangster film, Black Mass.

Johnny Depp-starrer “Black Mass” world-premiered to positive response Friday at the Venice Film Festival where a relaxed Depp held court, musing on the challenges of playing Boston gangster James “Whitey” Bulger naturalistically, including a dramatically receding hairline, and how he feels risky physical transformations are part of his duty to give audiences “something new each time.” 

Director Scott Cooper’s biopic of Bulger, who became an FBI informant and used this status to eliminate criminal competition during the 1970s, ’80s and early ’90s, was greeted with applause at the Venice press screening and the press conference was packed to the rafters.

Here i have some pictures taken at the movie premier and some other latest photos of johnny depp 2015 Hope you like it !
