snippet.title: Amber Heard & Joe Lando -  A Place In Time
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986)[1] is an American actress. She made her film debut in 2004 in the sports drama Friday Night Lights. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006) and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms (2007).

Heard's breakthrough came in 2008 with roles in Never Back Down and Pineapple Express. She received the Breakthrough Award at Young Hollywood Awards. Her appearance in films such as The Informers, The Stepfather, Zombieland and The Joneses brought her further attention. She next starred in John Carpenter's The Ward, alongside Nicolas Cage in Drive Angry, and alongside Johnny Depp in The Rum Diary, for which she won a Spotlight Award at the Hollywood Film Festival. In 2014 she appeared in 3 Days to Kill, and in 2015 in Magic Mike XXL and The Danish Girl. She will play Mera in Zack Snyder's upcoming superhero film, Justice League.

Joseph John Lando (born December 9, 1961) is an American actor, most recognizable for playing Byron Sully on the TV series Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman.

Lando attended Stevenson High School in Lincolnshire, Illinois.[1]

His first acting role was as a patrolman in Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home. He received attention from his role as Jake Harrison in the soap opera One Life to Live, and he went on to co-star in the popular drama Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman as Michaela Quinn's love interest, Byron Sully. He also appeared in the television series The Guiding Light and starred in Higher Ground; also served as executive producer for Higher Ground. He also played a small part in the series Summerland next to Lori Loughlin, and appeared in eight episodes of the TV series The Secret Circle as John Blackwell, the father of the main character. In 2014 he joined several Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman castmates as they all reprised their roles for the "Funny or Die" parody Dr. Quinn, Morphine Woman.

He has also appeared in various films, such as Seeds of Doubt (1996) and No Code of Conduct (1998).

He was named one of People Magazine's 50 Most Beautiful People in the World for 1993.[2]
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard & Joe Lando -  A Place In Time
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986)[1] is an American actress. She made her film debut in 2004 in the sports drama Friday Night Lights. After small roles in North Country and Alpha Dog, Heard played her first leading role in All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006) and appeared in The CW television show Hidden Palms (2007).

Heard's breakthrough came in 2008 with roles in Never Back Down and Pineapple Express. She received the Breakthrough Award at Young Hollywood Awards. Her appearance in films such as The Informers, The Stepfather, Zombieland and The Joneses brought her further attention. She next starred in John Carpenter's The Ward, alongside Nicolas Cage in Drive Angry, and alongside Johnny Depp in The Rum Diary, for which she won a Spotlight Award at the Hollywood Film Festival. In 2014 she appeared in 3 Days to Kill, and in 2015 in Magic Mike XXL and The Danish Girl. She will play Mera in Zack Snyder's upcoming superhero film, Justice League.

Joseph John Lando (born December 9, 1961) is an American actor, most recognizable for playing Byron Sully on the TV series Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman.

Lando attended Stevenson High School in Lincolnshire, Illinois.[1]

His first acting role was as a patrolman in Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home. He received attention from his role as Jake Harrison in the soap opera One Life to Live, and he went on to co-star in the popular drama Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman as Michaela Quinn's love interest, Byron Sully. He also appeared in the television series The Guiding Light and starred in Higher Ground; also served as executive producer for Higher Ground. He also played a small part in the series Summerland next to Lori Loughlin, and appeared in eight episodes of the TV series The Secret Circle as John Blackwell, the father of the main character. In 2014 he joined several Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman castmates as they all reprised their roles for the "Funny or Die" parody Dr. Quinn, Morphine Woman.

He has also appeared in various films, such as Seeds of Doubt (1996) and No Code of Conduct (1998).

He was named one of People Magazine's 50 Most Beautiful People in the World for 1993.[2]

snippet.title: Amber splende sul red carpet
snippet.description:
Ancora sul red carpet e ancora insieme,la bellissima coppia Amber Heard e Johnny Deep. Questa volta il tappeto rosso era tutto per lei, elegante e splendente in un bellissimo abito floreale, per la presentazione del film che la vede protagonista “ The Danish girl “. Inutile dire che gli occhi erano tutti puntati nuovamente su di loro, Amber ha incantato il pubblico con la sua dolcezza e il suo radiante sorriso. Un'altra serata all'insegna del glamour.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Can’t Wait to Turn 30
snippet.description:
Actress Amber Heard — who wed Johnny Depp earlier this year — celebrates the milestone birthday next year and is enjoying getting older because she feels more and more confident as time goes by. She said, "I can't wait to turn 30 because every year that goes by, I feel better about who I am. I'm becoming more confident and aware of what I want to accomplish. It's a good feeling. I try to follow my instincts and see where that takes me.

snippet.title: Amber Heard fails to turn up to court appearance over Johnny Depp’s dogs
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp’s wife has once again been neither seen nor heard during a mention in a Queensland court of her famous dog-smuggling charges.
Amber Heard, the 29-year-old actress wife of Pirates of the Caribbean star Depp, was due to face Southport magistrates court on Monday.

snippet.title: Sky Gym Amber Monson Interview for Our Atlanta
snippet.description:
Who hasn't heard of Sky Gym Atlanta?! I first learned of aerial acrobatic silk lessons on the pier in Santa Monica, CA years ago. 
        It wasn't until years later that I walked into Sky Gym for my first class in our hometown. I was so pleased to see this being brought to the public for all of us to learn here in Atlanta! 
       Are you one of the people who have yet to hear about Sky Gym, be sure to catch this informative interview with Amber Monson. A pioneer in her Atlanta, she is the owner, an instructor, and female entrepreneur making aerial acrobatics a lifestyle and living here in Atlanta. 
http://www.aerialsilksatlanta.com
https://www.facebook.com/SkyGymAtlanta?fref=ts

404-309-9696
Dance@theskygym.com

6780 Roswell Rd Studio D100 
Sandy Springs, GA
30328

Keep up with our weekly video interviews here on Youtube or follow us at the any of the links below

http://www.artistlifevision.com/Our-A...
https://instagram.com/artistlifevision/
https://www.facebook.com/OurAtlantaIn...
http://artistlifevision.tumblr.com/

Of course, thanks for watching!
Stephanie Marlo & Team
Our Atlanta - Artist.Life.Vision Photography

snippet.localized.description:
Who hasn't heard of Sky Gym Atlanta?! I first learned of aerial acrobatic silk lessons on the pier in Santa Monica, CA years ago. It wasn't until years later that I walked into Sky Gym for my first class in our hometown.
     I was so pleased to see this being brought to the public for all of us to learn here in Atlanta, GA! 
    Are you one of the people who have yet to hear about Sky Gym, be sure to catch this informative interview with Amber Monson. A pioneer in her Atlanta, she is the owner, an instructor, and female entrepreneur making aerial acrobatics a lifestyle and living here in Atlanta.

snippet.title: Amber Alert: Toddler found safe, half-brother arrested
snippet.description: MILFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- A young child was found safe after an Amber Alert was issued for her in the Tri-State Monday, May 11. Local 12's Angenette Levy found the 22-month-old, Agnes Burgess, by chance in the neighborhood where the child lives with her family. Angenette knocked on the door of the home were Agnes older, half-brother lives, Donovan Coleman. A dog was barking very loudly and then a child could be heard screaming from inside the home. When nobody answered the door Angenette looked in the window and saw Agnes. She immediately called her mother. Agnes' mother went inside the house and found the child safe. It is suspected Coleman dropped the child off at the home after taking his mothers car from a pawn shop in Milford. "We're just fortunate that she didn't fall or anything like that. All's well that ends well and we still care about Donovan, he still needs to find himself a place 'cause otherwise everything is going to keep escalating." Police said the Coleman stole the car from his mother. The vehicle was found on Seymour Avenue in Carthage. People were found in the car and taken into custody by police. They told officials they had traded drugs for the vehicle. Donovan Coleman was found and is being questioned by Cincinnati police. He will face several charges including child endangering. Follow Angenette Levy on Twitter @angenette5, and LIKE her on Facebook.Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates! ------------------------------------------------------------- MILFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- An Amber Alert has been issued for a young man accused of taking off with his mother's car, with his young sister inside. Police are worried because the family says Donovan Coleman, 21, is a heroin user.Police say the 2003 Toyota Matrix was stolen this morning from the parking lot of Facet Music Jewelry and Pawn on Chamber Drive. Coleman's 22-month-old sister, Agnes Burgess, was in the vehicle. Police plan to charge Coleman with felony theft and child endangering.Agness has brown curly hair and blue eyes. She's wearing a multi-color pink tank top, pink shorts and no shoes or socks.The car is missing its front bumper. It has Ohio plates FBU 6986. Anyone who can help police find Donovan Coleman should call 825-2280 or 911. Anyone who can help police find Donovan Coleman should call 825-2280 or 911.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Wife Amber Heard Charged With Dog Smuggling, Faces Up to 10 Years in Prison
snippet.description:
The Australian government has charged Pineapple Express and Magic Mike XXL actress Amber Heard with illegally transporting her dogs into the country.

Heard faces up to 10 years in prison and fines up to $75,000 after smuggling her two Yorkshire terriers via private jet into the country, where she had been accompanying her husband, Johnny Depp, during the filming of Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales. In fact, not long ago the country threatened to kill the dogs.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard could face ten years in prison over dogs
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard could face ten years in prison over dogs

Johnny Depp's Wife Amber Heard Charged With Dog Smuggling, Faces Up to 10 Years in Prison


She is charged with illegally smuggling pet dogs Pistol and Boo into Australia on a private jet

Australia is really not kidding around—they’ve charged Amber Heard with the illegal importation of Johnny Depp’s dogs, meaning she could, technically, face up to 10 years in an Australian prison.

Officials somehow discovered in May that Depp, who’s shooting a film in the outback, and Heard had snuck their two Yorkshire terriers into the country without quarantining them. At the time, the government gave the spooky couple the option of removing their animals from the country or watching them die.

snippet.title: Magic Mike Interview w/ Amber Heard and Andie MacDowell
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Interview

Andie MacDowell Interview   

Magic Mike XXL Interview

Segment Producer Shawn Edwards

Segment Editor   Jalen Coleman

The filmmakers also amped up the volume with new characters that introduce unexpected challenges and directions. Amber Heard is the elusive Zoe, a photographer who catches Mike’s eye; Andie MacDowell is Nancy, an uninhibited Southern Belle who might have something BDR had given up hope of ever finding; Elizabeth Banks is Paris, who must be convinced to allow them a place on the convention bill; and Jada Pinkett Smith is Rome, a woman from Mike’s past.

As the festivities spill over into a beach party, illuminated mainly by car headlights, Mike has his first of several chance meetings with Amber Heard’s Zoe. An intriguing young woman with a flair for candid photography, Zoe is someone he’d like to learn more about, but, for the moment, she gives him only a smile and something to think about. “What I like about the way these two interact is that they don’t follow a traditional trajectory of ‘boy meets girl, boy chases girl,’” Heard observes of their keep-‘em-guessing interplay. “It’s not about that. We get the impression that they have something to impart to each other which is not possible in their first meeting, though they’re drawn to each other.”

Blacktree is at all the hottest events on the planet (award shows, movie premieres and press junkets, fashion shows, etc.) and now BLACKTREE ON TV brings stars to YOU on Soul of the South! Watch Full episodes below, and tune in!

WEEKDAYS | 5:30 – 6:00pm, 1-1:30am WEEKENDS | 5 – 6:00pm Sat & Sun (CST)

snippet.title: Amber Heard Looks Pretty & Purple at 'Magic Mike XXL' Hollywood Premiere
snippet.description:
Amber Heard is pretty in purple while attending the premiere of her new film Magic Mike XXL held at the TCL Chinese Theatre IMAX on Thursday (June 25) in Hollywood.

The 29-year-old actress was joined by her co-stars Elizabeth Banks, Jada Pinkett Smith, and Andie MacDowell.


Aisha Tyler and Emmanuelle Chriqui were also spotted showing some support for the film, which hits theaters on July 1.

FYI: Amber is wearing a Monique Lhuillier dress with jewels by EFFY, Melissa Kaye, and EF Collection. Elizabeth is wearing Pedro García

snippet.title: Top 7 Facts - Amber Heard // Top Facts
snippet.description:
Top 7 Facts - Amber Heard // Top Facts
These and other interesting Top Facts  you can know in this channel.
------------------
1. Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986) is an American actress. Amber Heard was born in Austin, Texas, the daughter of Patricia Paige , an internet researcher, and David Clinton Heard, a contractor.

2. While in Los Angeles, Heard made appearances in several TV shows and two music videos, Kenny Chesney's "There Goes My Life" and Eisley's "| Wasn't Prepared".

3. In late 2008, she filmed The River Why and The Joneses; two independent features. Variety highly praised Heard's acting performance, saying "she steals the show" and that she actually delivered better work than film's leading star Demi Moore in The Joneses.

4. At the beginning of 2009, The lnformers made its premiere at the Sundance Film Festival. Despite an all-star cast, the movie received generally negative reviews. Heard next appeared in Zombieland, playing a small role as the object of Jesse Eisenberg’s affection who turns into a zombie.

5. In March, Heard began filming The Rum Diary, opposite Johnny Depp,in Puerto Rico. Heard was reported to have won the role out over Scarlett Johansson and Keira Knightley. In 2010, she starred in and produced And Soon the Darkness, co-starring Odette Vustman and Karl Urban.

6. International Business Times described Heard as "talented enough to share a few heartfelt moments in a character that mostly operates on the defensive."

7. On July 16, 2015, Heard was charged by the Australian government for two counts of illegally importing the dogs into the country and one count of producing a false document. If convicted, she could face a prison sentence of up to 11 years and a AU$102,000 ?

snippet.title: Here's what an Amber / Tornado / Flash Flood / Dust Storm Alert Looks & Sounds Like on an iPhone
snippet.description:
Here's what an Amber Alert looks and sounds like on an iPhone. An Amber Alert is a child abduction alert system. Expand the description below to read how I was able to be ready to record this alert and what exactly an AMBER alert is.

These alerts are also seen and heard when there's a Winter Storm Warning, such as a Tornado is near, during Flash Floods, and also when there's a Dust Storm like when the Phoenix area of Arizona is sometimes hit with those huge sand storms called Haboobs.

How was I ready to capture the alert on video?
Well, I have two iPhones (one for work) and so when my personal one started going off and alerting, I quickly silenced the alarm and then started recording the second iPhone that I had which started it's alert very soon after the first one and I was able to capture it in time, as you can see in the video!

Why is it called an Amber Alert?
The Amber Alert originated in the United States in 1996. AMBER is officially a backronym for America's Missing: Broadcast Emergency Response, but was named for Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas, in 1996. Check out the Wikipedia entry for it for more info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AMBER_Alert

snippet.title: James Franco & Amber Heard Bring 'The Adderall Diaries' to Tribeca Film Festival 2015
snippet.description:
James Franco & Amber Heard Bring 'The Adderall Diaries' to Tribeca Film Festival 2015
James Franco suits while posing next to Amber Heard at the premiere of their new film The Adderall Diaries during the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival at BMCC Tribeca PAC on Thursday night (April 16) in New York City.

The duo was joined on the red carpet by their co-stars Christian Slater and Cynthia Nixon.

Based on the bestselling memoir by Stephen Elliott, The Adderall Diaries is the story of an author (Franco) paralyzed by writer’s block and an escalating drug dependency who is sucked down the rabbit hole of a high-profile murder case.

FYI: Amber is wearing Stella McCartney.

snippet.title: Reading and managing amber alerts on an iPhone
snippet.description:
How to read an Amber Alert in the San Francisco Bay Area on an Iphone if you missed the alert the moment it was on your screen.

Also how to turn on and off Amber Alerts and Government Alerts.

On Feb.11th 2014 an Amber alert was sent to the entire San Francisco bay area. In my office I heard the alert on scores of phones. There was a message splashed on the home screen of the phone but seconds later it was gone and there was no apparent way to read it. This video shows you how you can manage getting these messages and how to view it after it was received.

snippet.title: Amber Heard's Fiancé Subpoenaed to Testify in Bizarre Murder Case to Prove Defendant is Insane?
snippet.description:
Actor Johnny Depp has reportedly been subpoenaed to testify in a bizarre murder case. According to TMZ, the 50-year-old actor was served with legal papers at the premiere of his new film "Transcendence."

TMZ reports that Depp will most likely have to take the stand in connection to a 2009 homicide where a Los Angeles limo driver has been charged with mowing down and killing a pedestrian. Nancy Lekon is set to stand trial later this month, but has pled not guilty by reason of insanity.

http://q.gs/6b2F4

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Get Engaged to Amber Heard
snippet.description:
The 2011 film The Rum Diaries didn't do much for Johnny Depp's career but it had a lasting effect on his love life.

People reports that it's confirmed the actor, 50, has gotten engaged to his co-star from that movie, Amber Heard, 27.

Depp was previously in a long-term domestic partnership with French singer/actress Vanessa Paradis, which produced two children, Lily-Rose and Jack, before ending in 2012.

He's only been married once, early in his career to Lori Anne Allison, but has been engaged to Jennifer Grey, Sherilyn Fenn and Winona Ryder, who inspired him to get a tattoo that read "Winona Forever." When they split, he had it edited to say "Wino Forever."

Heard, who has publicly identified herself as bisexual, was previously attached to photographer Tasya van Ree.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp And Amber Heard Engaged?
snippet.description:
Rumors were swirling this week when Amber Heard was photographed seemingly trying to shield a diamond ring on her left hand. But now there's no reason to cover up. People magazine has confirmed that the actress is engaged to Johnny Depp.

"Of course they couldn't be happier to be engaged and excited to share the rest of their lives together," a source tells PEOPLE, adding that she has already told "close friends" the happy news.

The couple met on the set of their movie "The Rum Diary" and officially started dating the following year after Depp,50, had confirmed his spit from his girlfriend  Vanessa Paradis.

Depp and Paradis, a French actress and singer, had been together for 14 years and have two children, Lily-Rose, 14, and Jack, 11.

Heard is reportedly developing a close relationship with the kids.

"Amber has really taken well to the kids and really enjoys spending time with them," revealed the source. "And she's even taken Lily shopping on her own for some bonding time."

Heard, 27, has previously stated that she's bisexual and was in a four-year relationship with photographer Rasya van Ree.

snippet.title: Amber Heard, Johnny Depp Are Engaged!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard, Johnny Depp Are Engaged!


Johnny Depp really did put a ring on it! After Amber Heard was spotted trying to hide some suspiciously flashy bling on her left ring finger earlier this week, fans wondered whether the actress had secretly gotten engaged to her Rum Diary costar. The famously private couple have yet to confirm or deny either way, but sources tell Us Weekly they're indeed planning to marry.
"The proposal happened a while ago," one insider tells Us. "She just didn't wear the ring." (Celebuzz reported news of an engagement on Thursday.)



Johnny Depp never tied the knot in his past 14-year relationship with Vanessa Paradis, but now -- after less than two years together -- he's ready to walk down the aisle with new love Amber Heard. 

2.Back in 2010, Depp explained to Extra why he hadn't wed French actress and singer Paradis, now 41, the mother of his children Lily-Rose, 14, and Jack, 11. "I never found myself needing that piece of paper," he shared. "Marriage is really from soul to soul, heart to heart. You don't need somebody to say, okay you're married."

3.That being said, however, the Pirates of the Caribbean star clarified that he wasn't opposed to marriage. "If Vanessa wanted to get hitched, why not," he said. "But the thing is, I'd be so scared of ruining her last name. She's got such a good last name."

4.The Lone Ranger star has been married once before to Lori Anne Allison from 1983 to 1985. He's previously been engaged to actresses Jennifer Grey, Sherilyn Fenn and Winona Ryder, and had a talked-about four-year relationship with supermodel Kate Moss.

5.Depp and Paradis announced their breakup in June 2012 after 14 years together. A year later, Depp broke his silence about their split.

6."Relationships are very difficult. Especially in the racket that I'm in because you're constantly away or they're away and so it's hard. It wasn't easy on her. It wasn't easy on me. It wasn't easy on the kids," he told Rolling Stone in July 2013. "So, yeah. The trajectory of that relationship -- you play it out until it goes, one thing leads to another. So for whatever reason that ­ceases, it doesn't stop the fact that you care for that person, and they're the mother of your kids, and you'll always know each other, and you're always gonna be in each other's lives because of those kids. You might as well make the best of it."


7.Shortly after his breakup from Paradis, Depp began dating Heard, whom he met on the set of The Rum Diary. Earlier this week, Heard was spotted wearing huge sparkler on her ring finger. The resolutely private couple has to confirm their engagement, but an insider told Us: "The proposal happened a while ago. She just didn't wear the ring."

8.Johnny Depp really did put a ring on it! After Amber Heard was spotted trying to hide some suspiciously flashy bling on her left ring finger earlier this week, fans wondered whether the actress had secretly gotten engaged to her Rum Diary costar. The famously private couple have yet to confirm or deny either way, but sources tell Us Weekly they're indeed planning to marry.


Read more: http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/johnny-depp-engaged-to-amber-heard-why-he-never-married-vanessa-paradis-during-14-year-relationship-2014171#ixzz2qjNeO0js 















.Johnny Depp really did put a ring on it! After Amber Heard was spotted trying to hide some suspiciously flashy bling on her left ring finger earlier this week, fans wondered whether the actress had secretly gotten engaged to her Rum Diary costar. The famously private couple have yet to confirm or deny either way, but sources tell Us Weekly they're indeed planning to marry.
"The proposal happened a while ago," one insider tells Us. "She just didn't wear the ring." (Celebuzz reported news of an engagement on Thursday.)

2.The 50-year-old Into the Woods actor first met his bride-to-be on the set of their movie The Rum Diary. They confirmed their relationship in June 2012, shortly after Depp announced his split from longtime love Vanessa Paradis, with whom he has two kids, daughter Lily-Rose, 14, and son Jack, 11.

3.Since then, the typically private duo have been spotted all over the world together, from Moscow to Japan, where they took Depp's kids in July. More recently, on Saturday, Jan. 11, the duo appeared at the Art of Elysium's 7th Annual HEAVEN Gala in L.A., where they held hands and posed for pictures. They also attended the 2014 Golden Globe Awards on Jan. 12.

4.Later this year, the couple will reunite onscreen in London Fields, a crime thriller based on the 1989 novel of the same name by Martin Amis. Depp has a cameo on the movie, which also stars Billy Bob Thornton, Jim Sturgess, and Theo James.

Read more: http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/amber-heard-johnny-depp-engaged-2014171#ixzz2qjjky8c6

snippet.title: Is Amber Heard Engaged to Johnny Depp? Actress Is Wearing a Massive Ring!
snippet.description:
Is Amber Heard Engaged to Johnny Depp? Actress Is Wearing a Massive Ring! Is Johnny Depp planning to settle down with Amber Heard? Like, really settle down?!
Despite a good effort to keep her left hand covered, an eagle-eyed paparazzo got a bird's-eye view of what appeared to be a diamond ring on that ringer as Heard was leaving a restaurant last night in Los Angeles.
Reps for both Heard, 27, and Depp, 50, have not yet responded to the question this ring instantly brings to mind—is the handsome couple engaged?!
Until this past weekend, the public side of their romance had been relegated to photos of the two out and about in various cities around the world and vague references to romance and privacy in interviews.

snippet.title: Amber Heard, Johnny Depp Are Engaged!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard and Johnny Depp are engaged a year-and-a-half after confirming their relationship in June 2012, a source tells us.
Johnny Depp really did put a ring on it! After Amber Heard was spotted trying to hide some suspiciously flashy bling on her left ring finger earlier this week, fans wondered whether the actress had secretly gotten engaged to her Rum Diary costar. The famously private couple have yet to confirm or deny either way, but sources tell Us Weekly they're indeed planning to marry.
"The proposal happened a while ago," one insider tells Us. "She just didn't wear the ring." (Celebuzz reported news of an engagement on Thursday.)
The 50-year-old Into the Woods actor first met his bride-to-be on the set of their movie The Rum Diary. They confirmed their relationship in June 2012, shortly after Depp announced his split from longtime love Vanessa Paradis, with whom he has two kids, daughter Lily-Rose, 14, and son Jack, 11.
Since then, the typically private duo have been spotted all over the world together, from Moscow to Japan, where they took Depp's kids in July. More recently, on Saturday, Jan. 11, the duo appeared at the Art of Elysium's 7th Annual HEAVEN Gala in L.A., where they held hands and posed for pictures. They also attended the 2014 Golden Globe Awards on Jan. 12.
PHOTOS: Johnny Depp's movie makeovers
Later this year, the couple will reunite onscreen in London Fields, a crime thriller based on the 1989 novel of the same name by Martin Amis. Depp has a cameo on the movie, which also stars Billy Bob Thornton, Jim Sturgess, and Theo James.

snippet.title: 3 Days to Kill Trailer 2014 Kevin Costner, Amber Heard Movie - Official [HD]
snippet.description:
3 Days to Kill trailer 2014 - Official movie trailer in HD 1080p - starring Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen  - directed by McG - A dying Secret Service Agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

"3 Days to Kill" movie hits theaters on February 21, 2014.

In this heart pounding action-thriller, Kevin Costner is a dangerous international spy, who is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter, whom he's previously kept at arm's length to keep out of danger. But first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town. 3 Days to Kill movie trailer 2013 is presented in full HD 1080p high resolution.

3 DAYS TO KILL 2014 Movie
Genre: Thriller, Action, Drama
Director: McG
Actors: Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen

3 Days to Kill movie trailer courtesy Relativity Media. 

Cieon Movies is your daily dose of everything movies with an extended selection of official licensed movie trailers and movie clips.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Games
snippet.description:
The Amber Heard Games to train your smart brain. There are many different pictures angle of Amber Heard for awesome fans like you. So, it's a very great find different game for everyone that love Amber Heard. If you are fans of Amber Heard, then this game is just for you.

Download Games Here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RevoApp.AmberHeardFind


Biography:
=======
Amber Heard starred in Paranoia (2013), opposite Harrison Ford, Liam Hemsworth and Gary Oldman. The film was released by "Relativity Media" on August 16, 2013.

She also starred in Robert Rodriguez's Machete Kills (2013), which was released by "Open Road Films" on September 13, 2013 and McG's 3 Days to Kill (2014), opposite Kevin Costner and Hailee Steinfeld, which will be released in 2014.

Additionally, her film All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006), which premiered at the 2006 Toronto Film Festival, was released by The Weinstein Co. in theaters in the fall of 2013.

She was last seen starring in The Rum Diary (2011), opposite Johnny Depp, and John Carpenter's The Ward (2010), which premiered at the 2010 Toronto Film Festival. She also starred in the independent film, And Soon the Darkness (2010), in which she additionally served as a co-producer.

snippet.title: The Reel Review - 3 Days to Kill - starring Kevin Costner and Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Move over Liam Neeson it looks like your arch nemesis is in town! Oh yes giving the Taken star a run for his 'older action man' money is Kevin Costner - back on our screens leading 3 Days to Kill. The big question is though... is it any good? Here's The Reel Deal. 

For more on The Reel Deal subscribe to our Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/user/thereeldealfilmshow

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/thereelfilmshow
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thereelfilmshow

Special thanks to Celebritain @celebritain,  I Blame Hollywood @_blamehollywood and Top 10 Films @Top10Films for all their support

Celebritain: http://celebritain.com
I Blame Hollywood: http://iblamehollywood.co.uk
Top 10 Films: http://www.top10films.co.uk

ABOUT 3 DAYS TO KILL (12A)

In this heart pounding action-thriller, Kevin Costner is a dangerous international spy, who is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter, whom he's previously kept at arm's length to keep out of danger. But first, he must complete one last mission- even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town. Also staring Amber Heard and Hailee Steinfield.

Kevin Costner è Ethan Renner, una spia internazionale che decide di abbandonare una vita vissuta sul filo del rasoio per riallacciare i rapporti con moglie e figlia, tenute sempre a debita distanza per allonatanarle dai pericoli connessi al suo lavoro. Prima però dovrà portare a termine un'ultima missione, anche se questo significherà dover trovare un equilibrio tra i due compiti più difficili che gli siano mai stati assegnati: catturare il terrorista più pericoloso al mondo e proteggere la figlia adolescente.

snippet.title: 3 DAYS TO KILL - Featurette - Amber Heard (VOST)
snippet.description:
Ethan Renner est un redoutable agent secret résolu à renoncer à sa vie trépidante pour se rapprocher enfin de sa femme et de sa fille, qu'il a longtemps tenues à distance pour les protéger. Lorsqu'on lui impose une ultime mission, il doit mener de front les deux combats les plus difficiles de sa carrière : traquer un dangereux terroriste et s'occuper de sa fille adolescente pour la première fois depuis dix ans. 
Retrouvez toutes les infos sur le film sur :https://www.facebook.com/3daystokill

snippet.title: Amber Heard & Future Stepdaughter Lily-Rose Depp Laugh & Bond While Shopping (PHOTOS)
snippet.description:
Amber Heard lets out a laugh and looks to be having a blast as she steps out for a shopping trip with fiance Johnny Depp's daughter Lily-Rose on Sunday (February 2) in West Hollywood, Calif.

The 27-year-old actress and Lily-Rose, 14, shared some smiles at the checkout counter at the boutique that they visited. Looks like these two are good pals!

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Amber Heard

In case you missed the news, it was recently announced that Johnny and Amber are engaged. Congrats again to the happy couple!

snippet.title: Conexão Perigosa (2013) - TRAILER
snippet.description:
Direção de Robert Luketic
Com Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Amber Heard e Harrison Ford no elenco.
Sinopse: Addam Cassidy é um ambicioso funcionário que não vê a hora de subir de posição dentro da empresa em que trabalha, a gigantesca Wyatt Corporation. Porém, após cometer um grave erro, ele entra na lista negra de Nicholas Wyatt (Gary Oldman) o CEO da ca corporação. Para compensar o erro, Nicholas chantageia Adam para que ele seja empregado na maior concorrente, comandada por Jack Hoddard (Harrison Ford), o antigo mentor de Wyatt. 

Disponível para locação e coleção: http://bit.ly/1eB2jR0

2014 113min Thriller 

Dirigida por McG

3 Days To Kill Featurette - Character Files starring Kevin Costner, Hailee Steinfeld, Amber Heard and directed by McG

A dying Secret Service Agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

Release Date: 21 February 2014

Cast: Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen

snippet.title: 3 Days To Kill - Extrait #1 : Fête VOST
snippet.description:
3 Days To Kill - Sortie le 19 mars 2014

Un film de McG
Avec Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld 

Pour plus d'informations, de vidéos ou de bande annonce sur 3 Days To Kill et commander vos e-billets, rendez vous sur http://www.cinemasgaumontpathe.com/films/3-days-to-kill/

L'histoire de 3 Days To Kill :
Ethan Runner est un redoutable agent secret résolu à renoncer à sa vie trépidante pour se rapprocher enfin de sa femme et sa fille, qu'il a longtemps tenues à distance pour les protéger. Lorsqu'on lui impose une ultime mission, il doit mener de front les deux combats les plus difficiles de sa carrière : traquer un dangereux terroriste et s'occuper de sa fille adolescente pour la première fois depuis dix ans...

snippet.title: 3 días para matar - Entrevista Kevin Costner
snippet.description:
2014 113min Thriller 

Dirigida por McG 
Interpretada por Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen, Richard Sammel, Eriq Ebouaney, Tómas Lemarquis, Big John, Rupert Wynne-James, Peter J. Chaffey, Philippe Reyno, Eric Supply. 

Un agente del servicio secreto con una enfermedad terminal, acepta tomar una droga experimental que le salvaría la vida a cambio de realizar una última y peligrosa misión.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard spark engagement rumors
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and girlfriend Amber Heard are supposedly engaged, according to several reports.
"The Rum Diary" costars sparked engagement rumors this week when "The Playboy Club" alum was photographed leaving Hollywood's Ago restaurant attempting to conceal what looked like a sparkly engagement ring on her ring finger, E! Online reported.
On Friday, sources close to the fiercely private couple confirmed the nuptial news to Us Weekly. The news was first reported by Celebuzz on Thursday. However, there is no official word from the actors' reps, who declined to comment when asked about the engagement by Gossip Cop.

So before we start saying it's the married life for Johnny, here's what we do know and what's floating around the Internet.
Depp, 50, and Heard, 27, met in 2011 on the set of the gonzo flick "The Rum Diaries." Depp officially announced his split with longtime girlfriend Vanessa Paradis in June 2012 after 14 years and two children together: Lily-Rose, 14, and Jack, 11. He and Heard had been linked since the beginning of 2012, after Heard's ending a four-year relationship with ex-girlfriend Tasya van Ree, a photographer. 
Since then, the pair has been photographed together jet-setting all over the world.

( Read More: latimes.com/entertainment/gossip/la-et-mg-johnny-depp-amber-heard-engagement-rumors-engaged-20140117,0,7997677.story#axzz2qjACt8q8 )

snippet.title: JOHNNY AND AMBER, LOVE IS IN THE AIR!
snippet.description:
Three years of Johnny and Amber! Congrats to the couple!
October is a very special month to them because exactly three years ago their relationship could really begin.
We don't know what happened between them before it and I won't make any speculation.
What we know is that in October/2011 they really became a couple. Three years of love, passion, complicity, romance, understanding, support - and sex of course! :) 
I wish long life and a happy marriage to this gorgeous, sweet, hot (and, unfortunately, sometimes still so misunderstood by a group of judgmental people) couple! :D

L'histoire de 3 Days To Kill :
Ethan Runner est un redoutable agent secret résolu à renoncer à sa vie trépidante pour se rapprocher enfin de sa femme et sa fille, qu'il a longtemps tenues à distance pour les protéger. snippet.title: Johnny Depp Amber Heard's Slightly Medieval Engagement Party
snippet.description: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard threw an engagement party Friday night at an awesome, out-of-the-way venue that had Medieval touches. The party was thrown at the Carondelt House, miles away from Beverly Hills or Hollywood near downtown L.A. Lots of stars showed up, including Johnny's director Jerry Bruckheimer, Marilyn Manson, Rick Ruben and Ryan Adams. Steven Tyler says neither Johnny nor Amber stole the show -- that honor went to Johnny's mom.. There was a ton of food, including lots of vegan selections, to accommodate Amber.

snippet.title: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane ~ Trailer
snippet.description:
Starring Amber Heard and Anson Mount, "All the Boys Love Mandy Lane" is about a group of high-schoolers who invite Mandy Lane, "a good girl" who becomes the object of everyone's affection after returning from summer break, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to mysteriously drop one at a time.
 
Genre: Horror/Mystery/Romance/Suspense/Thriller
Rating: R (strong disturbing violence, pervasive drug and alcohol use, sexuality/nudity and language - all involving teens)
Release Date: October 11, 2013
Running Time: 90 minutes
Director: Jonathan Levine
Cast: Amber Heard, Anson Mount, Michael Welch, Aaron Himelstein, Edwin Hodge, Whitney Able, Luke Grimes, Melissa Price, Adam Powell, Peyton Hayslip, Brooke Bloom, Robert Earl Keen, Chad Feehan, Jacob Forman, Thomas S. Hammock, Brian Udovich

Bio and/or Filmography
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0490076/fullcredits?ref_=tt_cl_sm#cast

Official Site: http://alltheboyslovemandylane.com/

Clip from the track "Horror Trailer" composed by Kevin MacLeod of Incompetech. http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/

Original screen designs and text edits completed by graphic designer, Lisa3679, and gamer NathanWubs.

snippet.title: Amber Heard 'SYRUP' Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Synopsis

Based on the best-selling book, SYRUP is an edgy comedy that exposes the cut-throat world of advertising through the eyes of a young prodigy chasing fame, fortune, and the woman of his dreams. Fresh out of school with a degree in marketing, Scat will do anything to prove that he has what it takes to swim with the rich and wildly successful. Scat comes up with a brilliant new product that gives new meaning to the old saying "sex sells." He is sure it will send him right to the top...if only he can convince his boss, the beautiful and mysterious "6," that it's an idea worth millions. Betrayed by his best friend "Sneaky Pete," Scat stumbles through an industry riddled with deception. As he begins to realize that fame and fortune have cost him his morality, he must rediscover his true self behind the elaborate image he has created or risk losing the love of his life.
Copyright © 2013 Magnolia Pictures

snippet.title: Rolling Stones - Sister Morphine ● Amber Heard ● [vidoes by Taysa Van Ree]
snippet.description:
I don't really know what this video is about or for, I just really like Amber Heard and wanted to make a video of her, crazy fan right here.

While, as usual, criticism is very welcome, please do try to keep it constructive okay? I understand that means negative things, but please back it up with WHY you dislike it and what you would have thought could improve it. 

I do now realise that it seems to have rendered about a half second out of sync and that it has jumpy moments where the fade-cuts have messed up.

I hope you do like it.

snippet.title: The Rum Diary star Amber Heard is snapped as she leaves the vintage clothes store D
snippet.description: The Rum Diary star Amber Heard is snapped as she leaves the vintage clothes store Decades on Melrose Avenue Los Angeles after a shopping with a friend who accompanies her to her favourite muscle car her 1968 Ford Mustang. She is wearing her hair in a high bun with a bright pink zip up cotton dress teamed with leopard print plimsolls.The actress appears to be babysitting for a family member of friend as she is carrying a young boy in her arms as she rushes past the photographers who are asking persistent questions about her relationship with the recently divorced Hollywood superstar Johnny Depp.

snippet.title: Fast Lane Lifestyle Magazine Paranoia - Cast Interviews Amber Heard
snippet.description: The high stakes thriller Paranoia goes deep behind the scenes of global success to a deadly world of greed and deception. The two most powerful tech billionaires in the world (Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman) are bitter rivals with a complicated past who will stop at nothing to destroy each other. A young superstar, Adam Cassidy (Liam Hemsworth), seduced by unlimited wealth and power, falls between them and becomes trapped in their twisting, turning, life-and-death game of corporate espionage. By the time Adam realizes his life is in danger, he is in far too deep and knows far too much for them to let him walk away.

snippet.title: Amber Heard video slide show.     Patsy'  for Tom.
snippet.description: Amber Heard video slide show. She is set to star in Machete Kills and Paranoia, both to be released in 2013. In August 2012, Heard was in talks to replace Kristen Stewart, who abruptly dropped out in Nick Cassavetes' upcoming thriller Cali. Heard will play Mya, who goes along with her lover, played by Alex Pettyfer, in filming a fake snuff film. They make a lot of money and escape Los Angeles only to return a year later to try and rescue Mya's sister from a group of suspected thugs.

Genre: Action, Crime, Thriller 
Directed by: Robert Rodriguez
Screenplay by: Kyle Ward

Machete Kills red band trailer has gore, machine gun-equipped breasts and more!

Release Date: September 26, 2013

Directed by: Robert Rodriguez
Screenplay by: Kyle Ward

snippet.title: Amber Heard Sexy Styles
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard ( Austin , Texas , April 22, 1986 ) is an American actress . Began to be more known for her role as Greta Mathews series Hidden Palms and the film Never Back Down alongside Sean Faris and Cam Gigandet .
More recently starred in the movies The Ward (2010 ) , Drive Angry (2011 ) opposite Nicolas Cage and The Rum Diary (2011 ) with Johnny Depp.A his career begins in 2004 , when it enters the cast of the pilot episode of the series Jack & Bobby . In 2005 , makes an appearance in an episode of the series The OC . His first film role in 2004 still appears as Maria in the film Friday Night Lights.
In 2006 made ​​the main character in the movie All the Boys Love Mandy Lane , which debuted at the International Film Festival in Toronto . In 2008 starred opposite Seth Rogen in Pineapple Express . In 2009 , Amber starred alongside Penn Badgley film The Stepfather . In 2010 was released the film And Soon the Darkness where Amber is the protagonist , the film is a remake of the classic 70's , which also has Odette Yustman , Karl Urban and Oscar nominee Adriana Barraza .
In April 2010 , received the award Dallas International Film Festival Shining Star Award at the Film Festival of Dallas , the film The Joneses , which co-stars with Demi Moore and David Duchovny . Opposite , yet alongside Danielle Panabaker in the film The Ward , John Carpenter .
In 2011 it launched the film Drive Angry , in which he stars opposite Nicolas Cage and William Fichtner . In the same year , in September , NBC debut series The Playboy Club , in which Amber plays the role of a playboy bunny in the 60s ] . In October , opens in U.S. theaters the movie The Rum Diary , with Amber to star opposite Johnny Depp .

snippet.title: Paranoia (2013) starring Harrison Ford movie review
snippet.description:
Paranoia starring Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Liam Hemsworth, and Amber Heard is reviewed by Ben Mankiewicz (host of Turner Classic Movies), Alonso Duralde, (TheWrap.com and Linoleum Knife podcast) and Christy Lemire (Movie critic).

See what other critics are saying: http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/paranoia_2013/

In this high-stakes thriller, Adam Cassidy (Liam Hemsworth) is a regular guy trying to get ahead in his entry-level job at Wyatt Corporation. But after one costly mistake, Adam's ruthless CEO, Nicholas Wyatt (Gary Oldman), forces him to spy on corporate rival, Jock Goddard (Harrison Ford), Wyatt's old mentor. Adam soon finds himself occupying the corner office and living the life of his dreams. However, behind the scenes, he is simply a pawn in Wyatt's corporate game and realizes he must ultimately find a way out from under his boss who will stop at nothing, even murder, to win a multi-billion dollar advantage. (c) Relativity

http://twitter.com/ChristyLemire
http://twitter.com/ADuralde

snippet.title: Syrup 2013 Official Featurette - Amber Heard, Shiloh Fernandez, Kellan Lutz
snippet.description:
Movie: Syrup,
Genre: Comedy,
Director: Aram Rappaport,
Cast: Amber Heard, Shiloh Fernandez, Kellan Lutz,
Writers: Aram Rappaport, Max Barry,
In Theaters: June 7th, 2013.

Synopsis:
Based on the best-selling book, SYRUP is an edgy comedy that exposes the cut-throat world of advertising through the eyes of a young prodigy chasing fame, fortune, and the woman of his dreams. Fresh out of school with a degree in marketing, Scat will do anything to prove that he has what it takes to swim with the rich and wildly successful. Scat comes up with a brilliant new product that gives new meaning to the old saying "sex sells." He is sure it will send him right to the top...if only he can convince his boss, the beautiful and mysterious "6," that it's an idea worth millions. Betrayed by his best friend "Sneaky Pete," Scat stumbles through an industry riddled with deception. As he begins to realize that fame and fortune have cost him his morality, he must rediscover his true self behind the elaborate image he has created or risk losing the love of his life.


WE DON'T OWN ANY COPYRIGHT OF THIS TRAILER. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED TO ITS OWNERS.

snippet.title: Syrup Clip - Amber Heard takes on Brittany Snow
snippet.description:
https://www.facebook.com/syrupmovie - Based on the best-selling book, SYRUP is an edgy comedy that exposes the cut-throat world of advertising through the eyes of a young prodigy chasing fame, fortune, and the woman of his dreams. Fresh out of school with a degree in marketing, Scat will do anything to prove that he has what it takes to swim with the rich and wildly successful. Scat comes up with a brilliant new product that gives new meaning to the old saying "sex sells." 

He is sure it will send him right to the top...if only he can convince his boss, the beautiful and mysterious "6," that it's an idea worth millions. Betrayed by his best friend "Sneaky Pete," Scat stumbles through an industry riddled with deception. 

As he begins to realize that fame and fortune have cost him his morality, he must rediscover his true self behind the elaborate image he has created or risk losing the love of his life. In a world where the average person sees over eight hundred ads in a single day, SYRUP takes a biting look at the insidious—and often ridiculous—side of advertising. Crackling with romance and humor, this razor-sharp satire leaves you guessing and laughing until the end.

On Demand now and In Theatres 06/07 from Magnolia Pictures

iTunes: http://bit.ly/SyrupiTunes

snippet.title: Syrup Movie Clip - Finding You Very Attractive (2013)  Amber Heard & Shiloh Fernandez HD
snippet.description:
Syrup directed by Aram Rappaport and starring Shiloh Fernandez, Amber Heard

Synopsis:
Fresh out of school with a degree in marketing, Scat will do anything to prove that he has what it takes to swim with the rich and wildly successful. He comes up with a brilliant new product that gives new 
meaning to the old saying "sex sells" and is sure it will send him right to the top...if only he can convince his boss, the beautiful and mysterious "6," that it's an idea worth millions. Betrayed by his best 
friend, Scat stumbles through an industry riddled with deception. As he begins to realize that fame and fortune have cost him his morality, he must rediscover his true self behind the elaborate image he has created or risk losing the love of his life.

Release Date: June 7th, 2013
Genre: Comedy
Cast: Shiloh Fernandez, Amber Heard and Kellan Lutz
Directors: Aram Rappaport

snippet.title: Paranoia Trailer 2013 Official Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford Movie [HD]
snippet.description:
Paranoia Trailer 2013 - Official movie trailer in HD - starring Liam Hemsworth, Harrison, Ford, Gary Oldman, Amber Heard -- in this high stakes thriller, an entry-level employee at a powerful corporation must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure a multi-billion dollar advantage. 

"Paranoia" movie hits theaters August 16, 2013.

The high stakes thriller "Paranoia" takes us deep behind the scenes of global success to a deadly world of greed and deception. The two most powerful tech billionaires in the world (Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman) are bitter rivals with a complicated past who will stop at nothing to destroy each other. A young superstar (Liam Hemsworth), seduced by unlimited wealth and power falls between them, and becomes trapped in the middle of the twists and turns of their life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Paranoia trailer 2013 is presented in full HD 1080p high resolution. 

PARANOIA 2013 Movie
Genre: Thriller
Director: Robert Luketic 
Cast: Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Amber Heard, Harrison Ford, Lucas Till, Embeth Davidtz, Julian McMahon, Josh Holloway, Richard Dreyfuss
Writers: Jason Hall, Barry L. Levy

Paranoia official movie trailer courtesy Relativity Media.

snippet.title: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth Cuddle at Paranoia Premiere - Interviews and Exclusive Photos!!
snippet.description:
Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth Together at Paranoia Premiere - Interviews with Liam Hemsworth, Amber Heard and EXCLUSIVE cute photos of Miley and Liam!!
http://bit.ly/SubClevverNews - Subscribe Now!
http://Twitter.com/ClevverNews - Follow Us!
http://Twitter.com/Katie_Krause - Send Katie a Tweet!
http://Facebook.com/ClevverNews - Like Us!
http://Clevver.com - Visit our site!
Miley and Liam Reunite on the Red Carpet!
Liam Hemsworth, Amber Heard and Harrison Ford hit the red carpet for the premiere of their movie Paranoia last night in LA -- and Miley showed up to support her fiancé. 
While many outlets are suggesting that the couple seemed "distant" -- I can assure you, I was on-hand and such was not the case. 
Before I get into details about Miam though -- check out what the cast told us about their stellar new film:
(RED CARPET PACKAGE)
Fun night. And you guys -- Paranoia hits theaters on August 16th. 
Now, back to Miley and Liam since I know that's what you're curious about.  They posed for several photos together and we spotted Miley hanging out with Liam's family at the end of the carpet while he worked the press line.  She glanced over at him several times, and while we did try to get a few questions with her -- it was pretty evident she wanted Liam to be the one to shine.
After he was done with press, they talked with his family some more -- and he was seen with his hands on her lower back.   Also you guys -- Miley's former Hannah Montana co-star, Emily Osment showed up -- and the two ladies spent 15 minutes or so catching up.  How cute!
And if you're wondering -- Miley was sporting her gorgeous engagement ring, so if you ask me -- all is well in the world of Miley and Liam right now. 
One thing is for sure -- don't expect Liam to open up about Miley to the public.  When asked about his social media preferences -- he said he'd be staying hush hush when it comes to his personal life... oh and, unlike Nick Jonas and Justin Bieber... he won't be posting any selfies -- take a look at what he told some other reports on the carpet last night:
(CLIP)
And, there you have it. 
So -- what do you guys think -- are Miley and Liam still going strong, or was this just an effort to stand united in public -- and will you be checking out Paranoia?  ( I hope the answer is yes!)
Let me know in the comment section below or send me over a tweet and then make sure you hit that SUBSCRIBE button for more exclusive interviews and details about your favorite celebs.  In Hollywood, I'm your host Katie Krause and thanks for watching.  Bye for now!

snippet.title: IL POTERE DEI SOLDI - Featurette "Liam Hemsworth"
snippet.description:
Featurette "Liam Hemsworth" del thriller IL POTERE DEI SOLDI, con Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Liam Hemsworth e Amber Heard, al cinema dal 12 Settembre 2013.

IL POTERE DEI SOLDI s'inoltra in profondità dentro un micidiale mondo di avidità e menzogna celandosi dietro le apparenze del successo globalizzato. I due miliardari più potenti del mondo nel settore della tecnologia avanzata (Harrison Ford e Gary Oldman) sono degli acerrimi rivali dal passato problematico, che non sono disposti a fermarsi davanti a nulla pur di distruggersi a vicenda. Un giovane dalla folgorante carriera, Adam Cassidy (Liam Hemsworth), sedotto dalla ricchezza e dal potere senza limiti, s'intromette fra i due e rimane intrappolato nei loro contorti e imprevedibili giochi di spionaggio industriale la cui posta è la vita o la morte. Quando Adam capisce che la sua vita è in pericolo, è ormai andato troppo in là e sa troppe cose perché i due lo lascino andare via.

Seguici su Facebook: https://facebook.com/moviemaxitalia
Seguici su Twitter: http://twitter.com/moviemax_italia

snippet.title: 3 Days to Kill Trailer 2014 Kevin Costner Movie - Official [HD]
snippet.description:
3 Days to Kill trailer 2014 - Official movie trailer in HD 1080p - starring Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen  - directed by McG - A dying Secret Service Agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

"3 Days to Kill" movie hits theaters on February 21, 2014.

In this heart pounding action-thriller, Kevin Costner is a dangerous international spy, who is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter, whom he's previously kept at arm's length to keep out of danger. But first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town. 3 Days to Kill movie trailer 2013 is presented in full HD 1080p high resolution.

3 DAYS TO KILL 2014 Movie
Genre: Thriller, Action, Drama
Director: McG
Actors: Kevin Costner, Amber Heard, Hailee Steinfeld, Connie Nielsen

snippet.title: "Three Days To Kill" - Behind The Scenes Snapshots - Kevin Costner, Hailee Seinfeld, Amber Heard
snippet.description:

snippet.title: 1968 Ford Mustang: Amber Heard Departs Urth Caffe.
snippet.description:
http://twitter.com/#!/CarsNstars -Follow Us! 
The Rum Diaries actress, Amber Heard, was recently spotted in Hollywood taking her 1968 Ford Mustang for a spin. The star is famous of making news as a self-confessed muscle car lover and is frequently seen on the Los Angeles streets sporting her classic 68. Amber, like many celebrities, has admitted that she has a collection of cars but this particular Mustang is her favorite. The Ford Mustang has been hugely prominent in pop culture, having been a focal point of over 500 films such as the James Bond films and Apollo 13. In addition, the muscle cars have been cast along side some of Hollywood's most coveted actors and was the inspiration for Sir Mack Rice and Wilson Pickett's 1965 smash hit, Mustang Sally.

C12CCFCA

snippet.title: Never Back Down OST
snippet.description:
Never Back Down (also known as The Fighters) is a 2008 action film starring Sean Faris, Amber Heard, Cam Gigandet, and Djimon Hounsou.

Music by Tyler Barker

Plot: Jake Tyler (Sean Faris) has recently moved from Iowa to Orlando, Florida with his mother, Margret (Leslie Hope), and younger brother, Charlie (Wyatt Smith), to support Charlie's shot at a professional tennis career. Jake was a star athlete on the football team at home, but in this new city, he is an outsider with a reputation for being a quick tempered brawler after an internet video of him starting a fight circulates around his new school.

snippet.title: RAW: Liam Hemsworth Teases Co-star Amber Heard about ZBB
snippet.description:
Stream Fox 17 newscasts LIVE starting with TN Mornings at 5 am and News at 9 pm.Liam Hemsworth and his Paranoia co-star Amber Heard have something in common folks here in Music City might find interesting.Both of these Hollywood stars' resumes include a featured role in a Country music video. Heard appeared in Kenny Chesney's There Goes My Life and Hemsworth starred in the Zac Brown Band's Colder Weather.But when the topic came up, Hemsworth got a bit of a surprise. It seems Heard had never heard of the crossover mega stars ZBB. Watch what happened before our official interview started.Follow us on Twitter @wztv_fox17 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates.

snippet.title: Relookings Closer spécial fêtes : le look d'Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Cette année, le look rétro est de mise. Pour réaliser la même coiffure que la sulfureuse actrice, rien de plus simple : munissez-vous d'un fer à lisser et suivez le guide.

ÉTAPE 1
Laissez une mèche libre sur le front. Sur le côté, enroulez une mèche avec votre fer à lisser. Attendez quelques secondes, ôtez le fer sans dérouler la mèche et fixez-la à l'aide d'une pince. Répétez l'opération sur le côté opposé, puis sur l'arrière.

ÉTAPE 2
Travaillez la mèche du dessus de la tête au fer et placez-la sur le côté.

ÉTAPE 3
Otez les pinces et passez vos doigts dans toute votre chevelure pour détendre les ondulations. Ensuite, retravaillez les mèches en les plaçant comme vous le souhaitez.

In this heart pounding action-thriller, Kevin Costner is a dangerous international spy, who is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter, whom he's previously kept at arm's length to keep out of danger. But first, he must complete one last mission- even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town.

snippet.title: 1968 Ford Mustang: Actress Amber Heard Caught In Her Muscle Car In Hollywood.
snippet.description:
http://twitter.com/carsnstars - Follow Us!
The Rum Diaries actress, Amber Heard, was recently spotted in Hollywood taking her 1968 Ford Mustang for a spin. The star is famous of making news as a self-confessed muscle car lover and is frequently seen on the Los Angeles streets sporting her classic 68. Amber, like many celebrities, has admitted that she has a collection of cars but this particular Mustang is her favorite. The Ford Mustang has been hugely prominent in pop culture, having been a focal point of over 500 films such as the James Bond films and Apollo 13. In addition, the muscle cars have been cast along side some of Hollywood's most coveted actors and was the inspiration for Sir Mack Rice and Wilson Pickett's 1965 smash hit, Mustang Sally.

snippet.title: The Rum Diary - Cronache di una passione | Intervista a Amber Heard
snippet.description:
http://therumdiary.msn.it

http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Rum-Diary-Cronache-di-una-passione/31016988...

Dal 24 aprile al cinema.

Tratto dal primo romanzo di Hunter S. Thompson, The Rum Diary racconta la storia del giornalista free lance Paul Kemp (Johnny Depp). Stanco della confusione e della follia di New York e delle pesanti convenzioni sociali dell'America negli ultimi anni di Eisenhower, Kemp si trasferisce a Puerto Rico per scrivere su un quotidiano locale, The San Juan Star, diretto da Lotterman (Richard Jenkins). Adeguatosi volentieri all'abitudine dell'isola di bere continuamente rum, Paul è ossessionato da Chenault (Amber Heard), la bellissima americana del Connecticut fidanzata con Sanderson (Aaron Eckhart). Sanderson, un uomo d'affari implicato in loschi investimenti immobiliari, è uno dei sempre più numerosi imprenditori americani decisi a trasformare l'incontaminata Puerto Rico in un paradiso capitalistico a disposizione dei ricchi. Quando Sanderson lo assume per scrivere a favore del suo progetto, Kemp ha di fronte a sé una scelta: usare le sue parole per sostenere il corrotto uomo d'affari o usarle per attaccare il suo progetto.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Sexy at MontBlanc Vanity Fair Party in Antonio Berardi
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Sexy at MontBlanc Vanity Fair Party in Antonio Berardi 
http://bit.ly/SubClevverStyle - Subscribe to ClevverStyle! 
http://Facebook.com/ClevverStyle - Like Us!  

Today's stand out is the stunning Amber Heard at the Montblanc Vanity Fair party in Los Angeles, California. 

The 25 old stunner stepped out in Antonio Berardi frock to celebrate the Collection Princess Grace of Monaco—which is full of beautiful pieces—anything from jewelry to writing pens. Heard's t-length frock is from the designers 2012 resort collection and I'm actually obsessed. 

It's pretty modest as a whole, but it really has some amazing detailing around the top of the dress—a crystal pattern to be exact. The frock was tailored perfectly to Amber's fit figure—tight right about the waist line and hugging her curves. 

Heard paired the gown with none other than Black peep toe Chrisitan Louboutin—and as for accessories, she kept it simple with delicate Monte Blanc studs. 

The beauty who has played along side studs like Johnny Depp and Eddie Cibrian chose to keep her signature tousled locks and her makeup was a little bit more on the daring side—which is a great compliment to a conservative ensemble—she played up her eyes with a winged eyeliner and a dark shadow in the crease of her eye. To round out the look, she lined the bottom of her eye with the same darker color and lined the inner rim of her eyes with a white liner to make them pop! 

Her complexion was glowing and she finishe of the makeup with a very natural pink pout. 

I'm Brianna Baxter for Red.

snippet.title: Fallen Angels - Amber Alert
snippet.description:
This video is dedicated to our Fallen Angels, children everywhere that have fallen victim to abuse and crimes of violence.

Romans 12:19 Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.

While talking with my sister one night last Fall she recanted a story that she claimed she had heard on the news. It was about a little girl who had been abducted from her bedroom in the middle of the night while her parents were sleeping in a nearby room. When they woke up the next morning they called the police immediately to report it, however, an Amber Alert was not issued because her Dad was on Welfare and her Mom was a dancer at a local exotic dance club. I was never able to verify the story but the next day I wrote this song and called it Amber Alert.

You can find all of these Fallen Angels pictures and news stories on the Internet.

If you are in need of prayer either email me or add your prayer requests to the comments section and I will pray for you. 

Copyright
George Deveaux

snippet.title: FBI Wanted - AMBER ELIZABETH CATES - ($25.000 Reward) Kidnappings & Missing Persons
snippet.description:
HELP THE FBI ! SHARE THIS VIDEO...

AMBER ELIZABETH CATES

April 11, 2004
Columbia, Tennessee

REWARD:

A reward of up to $25,000 is being offered for relevant information leading to the recovery of Amber Cates or the prosecution of person(s) responsible for crimes committed against Amber Cates.

Amber Elizabeth Cates was last seen on April 11, 2004, in the Columbia, Tennessee, area. She was on her way to spend her spring break week with a relative, but has not been seen or heard from since the time she disappeared.

READ DESCRIPTION!! 

[I DO NOT OWN ANYTHING! ALL RIGHTS GO TO THE MAKERS OF THIS MOVIE/SHOW, THE WRITERS OF THE SONGS AND THE ARTIEST WHO DREW THE PICTURES]

Mixed the Ward with Crazy!Sam...thought it worked out..and since she's my face claim for Sam's love interest in my RP with a friend, I enjoyed making it even more.

So the story goes..
Sam met an angel, who he never learned the name of, but instantly fell in love with. She was once human before regaining her grace, but forgot all her memories in the long run...all she remembers is from when she was saved and grew her golden wings. She was told to make sure Sam never gave into Lucifer, to make sure he never said yes. But soon, the angel grew sick, death reaching closer and closer, so Sam had to do something...since he hasn't felt this way about anyone since Jess, and he couldn't lose another.

While the angel was in the hospital, Sam left to give in, fighting his brother, and Michael along the way. She awoken once the pit was opened, and ran through the grave yard to find her human. Sam was already ready to jump in when she got there, and vanished before she could take old of him. The woman sat beside Dean, who was broken and torn, and waited for a miracle. When the pit closed, she suddenly remembered everything of her past...why she's pained and what brought her to fall...all the humanly worldly pleasures, and disadvantages she faced...including killing both her parents, and burning the house she once called home. The angel asked Castiel to kill her...because her doing to Sam has failed...and that's exactly what he did.

Soon, she woke up in the mental hospital, human once again, not remembering Sam, or anyone else she came in contact with that was down his line. When she came face to face with the brown haired broken man in the same hallway, it was basically like meeting him for the first time...but felt like she knew him in a past life. Sam still loves her, and will do anything...to make things right.

snippet.title: Mujer Con Ovarios (Amber Heard) (Drive Angry Movie-Nicolas Cage)
snippet.description:
Amber Heard en el papel de "Piper" de la Pelicula (Drive Angry Movie con Nicolas Cage), vive una historia de Violencia de Genero Tras poner mas espectativa de lo que Merecia su relacion de pareja. (Casi todas las Historias pasan x Ahi, por Apresurarse a convivir, quemar etapas, etc.) Esta bueno tambien que en la peliculas se muestra a Hombre (Nicolas Cage En el Papel de Milton)...que la Socorre ante una situacion muy complicada de INFIDELIDAD X PARTE DE SU PAREJA Y POSTERIORMENTE VIOLENCIA EXTREMA!)... 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Amber Heard BIO.
Su debut como conductora de televisión le llegó en el 2007 en el programa de televisión Hidden Palms de la CW. Su gran éxito le llegó en 2008 con actuaciones en Never Back Down (Rompiendo las reglas) y Pineapple Express (Superfumados / Piña Express). En 2009 Heard protagonizó The Stepfather (El padrastro) y también tuvo un pequeño papel en la comedia de terror Zombieland. También ha participado en The Joneses (Los Jones) (2010), y tiene los papeles de las próximas funciones en The Ward de John Carpenter y también junto a Nicolas Cage en Drive angry (Furia Ciega) y también junto a Johnny Depp en The Rum Diary.
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Drive Angry', 'Nicolas Cage', 'Milton', 'Pineapple Express', 'The Stepfather', 'The Joneses', 'The Rum Diary.']

snippet.title: Amber Heard: Johnny Depp Lights Up A Room
snippet.description:
Amber Heard has been quoted gushing about rumoured love interest Johnny Depp.

The famous character actor announced his split from Vanessa Paradis earlier this week, and was immediately linked to his 'Rum Diary' co-star.

"He lights up a room," she apparently said. "He looks even better close up. Johnny is a wonderful, special person."

Speaking to Entertainmentwise when the film was released late last year, the blonde bombshell was full of praise for Depp.

"Working with Johnny is wonderful," she said. "I didn't know what to expect and didn't know what I was getting in to. Anything I expected he far surpasses.

"He's wonderful to work with, everybody on set respects him and likes him, and it's because he brings so much to work with him in such a wonderful presence.

"People are drawn to him in a way I've never really seen before. Perhaps that's why he is the movie star that he is. I also respect his work ethic, he's true character actor trapped in a leading man's body, and I respect that."
snippet.tags: ['Johnny Depp', 'Vanessa Paradis', 'Amber Heard', 'Video', 'Johnny Depp Vanessa Paradis', 'Celebrity Couples', 'Johnny Depp Girlfriend', 'Johnny Depp Girlfriend Split', 'Johnny Depp Split', 'Celebrity News']

LYRICS:

Jesus, i heard you had a big house,
Where i could have a room of my own.
And jesus, i heard you had a big yard,
Big enough to let a kid roam.

I heard you had clothes in your closet,
Just the right size that i wear,
And jesus, i heard if i give you my heart,
Then you would let me go there.

Jesus, i heard about meal time,
When all your children come to eat,
I heard you got a great big table
Where every kid can have his own seat.

Jesus, they said there will be plenty
Of good things to children to share,
And jesus, i'd just like to tell you
I sure would like to go there.

Jesus, i heard that in your big house
There's plenty of love to go 'round.
I heard there's always singing and laughter
To fill the place with happy sounds.

And i've been thinking that a friend
Who would give me all that he's got
Before i had even met him
Well, he sure must love me a lot.

And jesus, i'd just want to tell you,
I sure do love you a lot!

Jesus, we just want to tell you,
We sure do love you a lot!

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Buys Amber Heard A Horse: "Lone Ranger" Star Buys Horse While Filming
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has been filming "The Lone Ranger" on location in Arizona, New Mexico and Colorado. Recently he purchased a horse for new girlfriend Amber Heard. Heard has been visiting Depp on-set frequently and it looks like she wanted to take a piece of the set home with her!

For the full story read Hollywoodlife.com
http://www.hollywoodlife.com

snippet.title: Amber Rose - Fame (feat. Wiz Khalifa)
snippet.description:
Download link: http://ul.to/j51kj67p (MP3 format, 7 MB). 

LYRICS:

Scrutinized,
Being blind sided by all the lights
They question what I'm made of
Like these rumours weren't made up
Can't shop for clothes, or buy some cigs
Without paparazzi waiting for a flick
This is a new situation
Now you're an overnight sensation

You're not ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh
You're not ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh

Can't deny, it's just fly
Private jets, flying high
Rocking, rocking things you won't see
Tell 'em made by givenchy
Three years ago, just a girl
Now your name is known around the world
This is a new situation
Now you're an overnight sensation

Now you're ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh
Now you're ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh

[Wiz Khalifa]
Uh, and you made it, this year,
Coming up so they hate it
Fly first class so the could get mad
You heard what they have to say but you paid it,
Now you're busting out
Doing your thing, in your face, cuss 'em out
Brag cause you're the one that they fuss about
You's bad little, motha shut your mouth cause

(everything you say will and can be used against you)

It's all because of the fame
F.A.M.E (repeats)

[Chorus]
Now you're ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh
Now you're ready for the fame
Woah oh oh oh

F.A.M.E (repeats)

Amber Rose's first single is here for you to pass judgement on. We'll tell you right off the bat it's probably something you didn't expect. Over a upbeat, piano driven instrumental, Wiz's boo sings about her life in the public eye. Instead of firing back at the critics, the bald beauty explains her journey to  the limelight. I'm sure folks will focus on the fact they can keep up with the beat so, by industry standards, that makes this an okay song.  As for her vocal ability, we can't really tell when there's auto-tune and production masking it. 

Amber said she's taking vocal lessons:
"I have my own unique sound, I make music that I love and I hope that my fans and the people that embrace me will love it also!  I've taken vocal lessons and I'm working on my album, but right now I'm in the beginning phases and I'm just taking my time."

snippet.title: Supergirl Teaser (Amber Heard) [FanEdit]
snippet.description:
YES, IT'S FAN-MADE. Footage & soundbites from Drive Angry [2011], Supergirl [1984], The Day The Earth Stood Still [2009], Superman Returns [2006], Blood  Creek [2009], Hollywoodland [2006], Mission Impossible III [2006] and the teaser trailer to Superman Returns.
Music by Henry Jackman - Frankenstein's Monster; X-Men First Class OST

NOTE - It's just a quick test to see if I could make Amber Heard(Drive Angry) look like Kara Zor-El. The story line is ambiguous in this trailer and I admit, I made it up as I went along!

SYNOPSIS: Kara awakens with no memory of who she is, before a corrupt US spy incriminates her, while she searches for her identity.
CAST:
Amber Heard - Supergirl/Kara Zor-El
Nicolas Cage - Unknown Enemy(voice)
Laurence Fishburne - Perry White
Henry Cavill - Kalel/ Clark Kent
Diane Lane - Martha Kent
Robert Knepper - US Marine General
David Morse - US Spy
Peter O'Toole - Zoltan (Voice)

snippet.title: Webkinz Short Story-Legend of the Amber Wolf
snippet.description:
Hey guys! Welcome to my first Short Story: Legend of the Amber wolf! I've worked on this for a while and I hope you guys enjoy it! Hope you like Grousey in it!! More details with him, and all. I made this at Esther's house, remember her in "Webkinz Birthday Party" When she was Violet?
So the story line is...
Sophie meets Stripy and Calie in the woods. They were talking about the rumor they heard from a bird: A legendary evil wolf was on the loose in THEIR woods!
I put a lot of hidden things in the video so watch it over and over to try to find its secrets, and then if you have a YouTube account, comment below so I can see how clever you guys are!
What do YOU think the moral of the story is??
Thanks for watching!
Comment like, and SUBSCRIBE!!
