snippet.title: Prairie Tide - surfs amber waves
snippet.description:
Prairie Tide is a 3 piece psychedelic surf band from the heartland. 
"We ride those golden waves of grain like nobody's business."
Here, Prairie Tide treats "Spring Break" revelers to an enchanting public performance. Each member, accomplished musicians in their own rights in other musical pursuits, came together to explore new avenues of musical expression. 
Quite successfully.

Prairie Tide is:
Lindsay Unruh - Acoustic Guitar/Vocals
Mason Monigold - Electric Guitar
Cody Grove - Drums 
[Remember: even if you were there then, you weren't this there.]

Prairie Tide - Live @ John Barleycorn's
-
When Johnny Depp and Jimmy Kimmel disparaged the Emerald City, the 
Peerless Princess of the Plains, known on maps as Wichita, little did they 
realize we don't take slights lightly. This is the old stomping grounds of 
Carrie Nation and history well records how she made her feelings be known.
Jimmy Kimmel's comedy skit about Wichitawesome as an alternative "Spring 
Break" destination was just too superficial. It missed all the good stuff. 
This is to set that shortcomming right.

Always another beautiful night in Wichitawesome, those of us on "Spring 
Break Forever" found something other than Wet Parka Contests to amuse and 
delight. Life is a resort and we are all just here on vacation. Enjoy it.

It's worth noting that Charles Plymell, one of America's greatest poets, 
was involved with a loose gang of experimental writers and "outsider" 
artists centered around Wichita, Kansas in post-war 1950s America. Plymell 
once revealed, "That was the advantage of nightlife in Wichita, Kansas. In 
Hollywood or New York, time would be in demand. Here it was spent for the 
good of it, not for the duty of it."

For not just years, rather generations, Wichita has been famous in the 
underground as one of the hottest places with some of the coolest people. 
Nothing has changed. 
But never think that this level of same-o same-o ever gets boring. 
Not hardly.

This is an experimental film made with our new mod: a "magic wand camera" 
- like an ice cream bar on a longer stick (but that's indicative of our 
"magical" mindset in Wichitawesome). It can be waved to achieve a level of 
intimacy not often "scene" .
This is not really a music video, per se.
It is more a portrait of a performance, a work of art (after we tweak it some to compensate for challenges during actual filming), a lens-painting of a band in an attempt to do what they do a little justice and capture a semblence of the enchantment.
(APPLAUSE for the band!)
Also, this is unrehearsed footage to preserve the authenticity of the 
encounter - we just show up and catch what we can, often never having heard the band before. 
A "Spring Break" blind date and we just got "lucky" as Jimmy Kimmel would say.
Then, it's the real deal.
Then, it's Wichitawesome!

Find Us:
http://facebook.com/WICHITAwesomest
http://facebook.com/WICHITAwesomeMUSIC
http://youtube.com/WICHITAwesomest
http://twitter.com/WICHITAwesomest
http://pinterest.com/WICHITAwesome

This is a free, pro-bono, volunteer effort to put our best face on for the 
rest of the world to see, then they will agree, that this is the 
WICHITAwesomest place on the planet.

The Kimmel's and Depp's in the world don't get to kick our clods and get 
away with it. 
(Ol' Captain Road Apples and Jolly Johnny - we do really love you!)

© All Rights Reserved by respective parties - 2012

snippet.title: Johnny Depp y Amber Heard, juntos de nuevo
snippet.description:
Según el diario The New York Post, el protagonista de 'Piratas del Caribe' se ha dedicado en cuerpo y alma para obtener una segunda oportunidad por parte de Amber Heard. De hecho, durante todo el mes de septiembre le ha enviado flores y poemas diariamente, algo que ha terminado por reblandecer el corazón de la modelo, quien no ha podido resistirse a la incesante llamada de su ex.

Visto en: http://www.youtube.com/europapress

Más vídeos relacionados en: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHevfag74YD8Do_KlHYq8gQmNsKO47KfE

snippet.title: La pub bijoux GUESS avec Amber Heard, égérie de Guess - Réalisé par Ellen von Unwerth
snippet.description:
Vous lui trouvez un petit air de Marilyn ? Gagné ! Amber Heard est l'égérie de Guess dans ce clip sexy et rétro inspiré des Misfits (les Désaxés) so 50's, style nouveau western.
http://http://www.chic-time.com/3_guess
"Avec sa beauté pleine de naturel et sont look d'American girl, Amber est l'incarnation même de l'essence de la femme Guess", déclare Paul Marciano, créateur de la marque Guess. "Cette campagne, réalisée par Ellen Von Unwerth (photographe célèbre) définit très clairement ce que la marque GUESS souhaite communiquer."

Soyons plus précis, c'est le film les Misfits (les Désaxés) auquel rend ici hommage Ellen von Unwerth (un film de John Huston 1961 avec Clark Gable, Montgomery Clift et la merveilleuse Marilyn Monroe).

Mannequins : Silvu Tulu et Amber Heard
Chanson : Simple Girl de Dale Earnhardt Jr. (album It's a corporate world)

snippet.title: Amber Heard The Next "Red Sonja"?
snippet.description:
http://Twitter.com/ClevverMovies - Follow Us!

Could Red Sonja be getting the Amber heard Treatment?  The actress could be getting the gig- those details up next!

Hey Fellow Movie fans, I'm Chelsea Cannell coming to you from our Clevver Movies Headquarters here in Hollywood. 

A remake of Red Sonja is on the books but an actress to star as the comic book hottie has yet to be selected.

Word is Amber heard is being eyed as the fav to play the iconic character. .
Producer Avi Lerner recently told the media, that they are talking to a few girls for the role but since they just finished the film "Drive Angry" with Amber -- they are definitely taking a hard look at the blonde beauty.

Lerner also revealed, currently Amber is his favorite for the role... and proving this is more than JUST a rumor... he also added "Amber is the new Red Sonja, She just doesn't know it yet!"

In the past Rose McGowan was rumored to be getting the role back when Robert Rodriquez was producing and Douglas Aarniokoski was directing. 

Now Lerner is supposedly in talks with director Simon West, who was the helmer behind "The Mechanic."

Lerner also added that the film is currently slated to shoot between Conan and it's sequel Conan 2.

The development process definitely seems to be heating up- so we'd love to hear how you think it's shaping up -- Is Amber heard your pick for Red Sonja? Or was Rose McGowan a better fit? And how about Simon West as the director? Make sure to fill us in.

And don't forget to follow us on twitter @clevvermovies or me @chelseacannell to make sure you stay up to date on all the latest Hollywood happenings.

Thanks for watching, see y'all next time!
snippet.tags: ['amber heard', 'red sonja', 'avi lerner', 'movie news', 'casting update', 'Rose McGowan', 'Robert Rodriquez', 'Douglas Aarniokoski', 'simon west', 'the mechanic', 'conan']

that I was right out of my head
The way he described it 
he said I'd be better dead than live
I didn't listen to his jive
I knew all along that he was all wrong
And I knew that he thought I was crazy
But I'm not, 
oh no

but I'm not that easily led
He said I was the type that was most inclined
When out of his sight to be out of my mind

No more ifs or ands or buts

I may have been only three, but I was swinging

Oh they used to laugh at me when I'd refuse to ride

snippet.title: Pinksixty News TUESDAY 27 DECEMBER 2011
snippet.description:
In the field of entertainment, top of our list is Zachary Quinto. We also had actor Sean Maher and actress Amber Heard. True Blood's Evan Rachel Wood came out as bisexual while Geri Jewell stood up to declare that she is a lesbian.
Jonathan Knight from New Kids on the Block came out, as did transgender musician Mina Caputo.

In the field of sport, we saw Swedish soccer star Anton Hysen, and US soccer player David Testo and former Maryland football player Akil Patterson. There were no raised eyebrows when figure skater Johnny Weir came out in his autobiography, 'Welcome to My World', but Surrey cricketer Steven Davies caused a stir when he stepped out of the closet. Former US basketball player Will Sheridan also decided to stand up but former Belgian professional football star Jonathan de Falco went one better and became a gay porn actor.

And finally, the world of journalism saw CNN anchor, Don Lemon come out in an interview with the New York Times, whilst ESPN radio's Jared Max outed himself on-air, after coming out first to his cat.

snippet.title: Saint Francis Academy Ch. 7
snippet.description:
The next day, Amber was walking through the halls of Saint Francis when the friend of the boy came up to her. He smirked down at Amber, tracing his fingertips across her cheek. "I heard you wouldn't give it up," he whispered in her ear.

"No, I-I won't," Amber said, trying to sound strong while being terrified on the inside.

"We'll see about that," he said softly, giving her butt a sharp smack before walking away.

Amber took a deep breath as she walked to her next class. Why did every boy in this school have to think constantly about sex? I mean, where does sex get you; nowhere, except a possible baby in the girl's belly.

During break before lunch, Amber was at her locker putting some books away. She fumbled with her purse and accidently dropped her key. When she bent down to pick it up, she felt someone grab her thong and yank it up. "Ow!" she exclaimed, shooting up. The boy let go and she spun around, her hand rising to slap him. Then she saw who it was. "Adam! That is not funny!" She hit his chest a few times before fixing her thong as he laughed. "You suck."

"And you lick," he winked. She slapped his chest again. "Well, don't have you underwear hanging out for everyone to see. I couldn't resist. The guys do it all the time around here."

"Yeah, well, you aren't like the other guys," Amber said, turning back to her locker. Adam closed the distance between them and held her firmly against the front side of his body.

"Don't say it so loud," he whispered in her ear.

Amber rolled her eyes but allowed Adam to kiss her neck. Adam was gay. He had been since the ninth grade here at Saint Francis. Sure, he had a part in him that thought girls were sexy, and some may call him bisexual, but Adam knew he really liked boys. But Adam also liked sex, and he tended to do a lot of girls. His problem was that he hadn't found a gay guy that he could try to get with.

"Ok, ok, enough," Amber mumbled, nudging her friend away. Adam winked down at her and took her hand. They walked with each other to the lunchroom. "Hm...I'm in the mood for some Mexican."  They headed over to the Mexican Restaurant inside the food court and were taken to a seat. They gave their drink orders to the waiter and headed to the buffet. They loaded their plates and each got a bowl of cheese dip before sliding back into their booth.

"So, I heard about the incident yesterday," Adam said, dipping a chip in his salsa and eating it.

"I think pretty much the entire school has," Amber mumbled, stabbing her burrito with her fork. "I didn't want everyone to know. I don't want anyone to know."

"Amber, the only reason we know is because he got the tawse," Adam said, taking a bite of his rice and beans. Amber looked up at him in shock. "You didn't know?" She shook her head. "Yeah, he got ten with the tawse. It was oiled too. He was limping this morning. Word is he tried to call his parents and get Dean Kevin in trouble, but they already knew what he had done, and agreed one hundred percent with the punishment he got."

"Does he care?" Amber whispered. "Does he even care that he almost raped me? Does he cared that I had nightmares last night?"

"Do you want me to be honest?" Amber nodded at her friend. "No."

Adam reached across the table and took her hand. "He doesn't care. He doesn't care about any girl in this school. He hasn't since his parents sent him here. All he wants is sex. He uses every girl he gets his sights set on. The best thing you can do is forget him."

"How do I forget him?" Amber said softly.

"Get rid of what he wants," Adam said. "...Your virginity."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

snippet.title: Drive Angry 3D Red Band Trailer - ThePopCornFever.com
snippet.description:
"Drive Angry 3D" stars Nicholas Cage, Amber Heard and William Fichtner. The film is directed by Patrick Lussier and written by Todd Farmer. The story revolves around Milton (Cage), a felon  who broke out of hell for one last chance at redemption. Intent on stopping a vicious cult who murdered his daughter, he has three days to stop them before they sacrifice her baby beneath a full moon. He's joined by Piper - a young, sexy waitress who liberates her ex-boyfriend's cherry-red muscle car in order to help Milton. Now, the two of them are hot on the trail of the deadly leader of the cult, Jonah King, who believes it is his destiny to use the baby to unleash hell on earth. But the bloodthirsty cult is the least of Milton's problems. The police are after him too. And worse, an enigmatic killer known only as "The Accountant" - who has been sent by the Devil to retrieve Milton and deliver him back to hell. With wicked cunning and hypnotic savagery, the Accountant will relentlessly pursue Milton at high speed across the country until his mission is accomplished. Fueled by high octane and pure rage, Milton must use his anger to go beyond all human limits to avenge his daughter's murder, before his last chance at redemption is revoked. 

For more details join us at http://www.thepopcornfever.com

snippet.title: The Ward - Il Reparto: Intervista a Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Kristen (Amber Heard), una giovane donna bella e disturbata, si ritrova coperta di lividi e di tagli, imbottita di sedativi e rinchiusa contro la sua volontà in un inaccessibile reparto di un ospedale psichiatrico. È completamente disorientata e non ha idea di quale sia il motivo per cui è finita in quel posto, né alcuna memoria della sua vita prima del ricovero. La sola cosa che sa è che non è al sicuro. Le altre pazienti del reparto, quattro giovani donne altrettanto disturbate, non sono in grado di fornirle alcuna risposta e ben presto Kristen si rende conto che le cose non sono come sembrano.

Tutti i trailer, le recensioni sugli ultimi film e le notizie sul Cinema su Voto 10: http://www.voto10.it

snippet.title: Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard (Austin, Texas, 22 de Abril de 1986) é uma actriz norte-americana. Começou a ser mais conhecida pelo papel como Greta Mathews da série Hidden Palms e pelo filme Never Back Down ao lado de Sean Faris e Cam Gigandet.
Mais recentemente protagoniza os filmes The Ward (2010), Drive Angry (2011) ao lado de Nicolas Cage e The Rum Diary (2011), com Johnny Depp.A sua carreira começa em 2004, quando entra no elenco do episódio piloto da série Jack & Bobby. Em 2005, faz uma participação num episódio da série The O.C.. O seu primeiro papel no cinema surge ainda em 2004, como Maria, no filme Friday Night Lights.
Em 2006 fez a personagem principal no filme All the Boys Love Mandy Lane, que estreou no Festival Internacional de Cinema de Toronto. Em 2008 atuou ao lado de Seth Rogen em Pineapple Express. Em 2009, Amber estrelou ao lado de Penn Badgley o filme The Stepfather. Em 2010 foi lançado o filme And Soon the Darkness no qual Amber é protagonista, o filme é uma refilmagem do clássico da década de 70, que conta também com Odette Yustman, Karl Urban e a indicada ao Oscar, Adriana Barraza.
Em Abril de 2010, recebeu o prémio Dallas International Film Festival Shining Star Award no Festival de Cinema de Dallas, pelo filme The Joneses, onde contracena com Demi Moore e David Duchovny. Contracenou, ainda, ao lado de Danielle Panabaker no filme The Ward, de John Carpenter.
Em 2011 é lançado o filme Drive Angry, no qual contracena com Nicolas Cage e William Fichtner. No mesmo ano, em Setembro, a NBC estreia a série The Playboy Club, na qual Amber faz o papel de uma coelhinha da playboy nos anos 60]. Em Outubro, estreia nos cinemas norte-americanos o filme The Rum Diary, com Amber a contracenar com Johnny Depp.

snippet.title: Amber Heard for "Guess" 2011
snippet.description:
Amber Heard goes West for in her Fall 2011 campaign for Guess.
The actress and star of the upcoming series "Playboy" gets steamy with a cowboy in the black and white ads, shot by famed photographer Ellen von Unwerth.
At closer glance, it's clear that Heard is channeling the most famous blonde of all: Marilyn Monroe.

The 24 year-old age actress is styled with Monroe's signature birthmark, cuffed Levis and red lips. She even seduces her cowboy near a bus stop sign, a clear nod to Monroe's 1956 film, where a saloon singer falls in love with a, you guessed it, cowboy.

I - love - it!

snippet.title: "Drive Angry" Big Game Ad
snippet.description:
DRIVE ANGRY 3D in Theaters February 25, 2011
Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, Billy Burke, and William Fichtner

In DRIVE ANGRY, Nicolas Cage stars as Milton - a hardened soul who broke out of hell to find the cult that killed his daughter and kidnapped her baby.  He joins forces with Piper (Amber Heard) -- a sexy waitress with a '69 Charger, who's also seeking redemption of her own.  The two of them are hot on the trail of the deadly leader of the cult (Billy Burke), while being pursued by an enigmatic killer (William Fichtner) who has been sent by the Devil to retrieve Milton and deliver him back to hell.
Rated R for strong brutal violence throughout, grisly images, some graphic sexual content, nudity and pervasive language.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Talks Drive Angry | Empire Magazine
snippet.description:
Subscribe to our channel: http://bit.ly/EmpireSub
The feisty actress on demons, devils and Nicolas Cage...
Thought Nicolas Cage films couldn't get any crazier? Think again! Drive Angry is a violent, blood-splattered road trip with killer cars, gigantic guns and gorgeous girls - and chief among the latter is Amber Heard's Piper. Escaped criminal Milton (Cage) only has three days to track down the satanic cult leader who brutally murdered his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter. He enlists the help of gun-toting, foul-mouthed, cowboy boot-wearing waitress Piper (Heard) and together they leave a trail of carnage from Colorado to Louisiana. We caught up with the actress to talk about firing guns, shooting in 3D and to find out if she drives a mean car herself... http://www.empireonline.com/interviews/interview.asp?IID=1200

snippet.title: Drive Angry | Trailer german deutsch & Kritik [HD]
snippet.description:
Drive Angry deutscher Trailer deutsch german & Filmkritik Review mit Franc Tausch. Mit Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner & Billy Burke. Ein Film von Patrick Lussier.

Kinostart / Filmstart von Drive Angry: 24. Februar 2011 im Kino.

Deine Gedanken ueber den Trailer und Drive Angry 3D Film Kritik Review mit Nicolas Cage?

BITTE KOMMENTIEREN, DAUMEN HOCH & ABONNIEREN

Franc's Twitter: http://twitter.com/FilmKritikTV2
Drive Angry Film trailer & Webseite: http://wwws.warnerbros.de/driveangry/index.html
Drive Angry Trailer & Website international: http://www.driveangry3d.com

Der abgebrühte Kriminelle Milton (Nicolas Cage) ist ausgebrochen, um sich eine letzte Chance auf Erlösung zu erkämpfen. Er muss einer barbarischen Sekte das Handwerk legen, die seine Tochter ermordet hat - nur drei Tage bleiben ihm, bevor die Fanatiker bei Vollmond auch seine kleine Enkelin opfern. Seine Wut treibt ihn dazu, alle menschlichen Grenzen zu überwinden, um sich einen letzten Rest Menschlichkeit zu bewahren.

Unterstützt wird Milton von der jungen und attraktiven Kellnerin Piper (Amber Heard), die zu diesem Zweck den Sportwagen ihres Ex-Freundes klaut. Gemeinsam heften sie sich an die Fersen des Sektengurus Jonah King (Billy Burke) und seiner mörderischen Jünger. Kaltblütig lässt King auch die Letzten seiner Getreuen von Miltons hochfrisiertem schwarzem 71er Challenger niederwalzen, um sein Schicksal zu erfüllen und die Hölle auf Erden zu entfesseln.

Doch Milton hat zunächst ganz andere Probleme als die blutrünstigen Fanatiker: Er wird nicht nur von der Polizei verfolgt, sondern auch von einem rätselhaften Killer, der "Buchhalter" (William Fichtner) genannt wird. Mit raffinierten Methoden und hypnotischer Bestialität jagt der Killer Milton gnadenlos über die verlassenen Landstraßen des amerikanischen Südens. Milton bleiben nur der konstante Adrenalinschub und seine unbändige Wut, um mit Pipers Hilfe Kings Gefolgsleute abzuwehren, Rache für seine Tochter zufordern und seine Enkelin zu retten, denn die Frist für seine Chance auf Erlösungläuft unerbittlich ab.


Drive Angry trailer german / Drive Angry trailer deutsch / Drive Angry german / Drive Angry deutsch / Drive Angry deutscher trailer / Kritik Kino Review Filmkritik Trailer DVD 2011

snippet.title: Movie Trailer van Drive Angry met Nicolas Cage en Amber Heard
snippet.description: In the high-octane, 3D action-adventure DRIVE ANGRY, Nicolas Cage stars as Milton, a hardened felon who has broken out of hell intent on finding the vicious cult who brutally murdered his daughter and kidnapped her baby. He joins forces with Piper (Amber Heard) - a sexy, tough-as-nails waitress with a '69 Charger, who's also seeking redemption of her own. Now, the two of them are hot on the trail of the deadly leader of the cult (Billy Burke), all while being pursued by an enigmatic killer (William Fichtner) who has been sent by the Devil to retrieve Milton and deliver him back to hell. Caught in a deadly race against time, Milton has 3 days to avoid capture, avenge his daughter's death, and save her baby before she's mercilessly sacrificed by the cult.

snippet.title: John Carpenter's The Ward | Trailer deutsch / german Full-HD 1080p
snippet.description:
John Carpenter's The Ward | Trailer deutsch / german Full-HD 1080p
Kinostart 29.09.2011

Völlig verstört wird Kristen (AMBER HEARD) in eine psychiatrische Klinik eingeliefert. Die junge, desorientierte Frau kann sich an nichts erinnern -- auch nicht daran, dass sie ein altes Farmhaus in Brand gesetzt haben soll. In der abgeschieden im ländlichen amerikanischen Nordwesten gelegenen Anstalt versucht Dr. Stringer (JARED HARRIS) in einem speziellen Programm, Kristens psychische Barriere zu durchdringen, ihr, wie auch vier jungen Mitpatientinnen, zu helfen. Doch Kristens mentaler Zustand scheint sich nur zu verschlechtern. Nachts, in den düsteren Gängen der vermeintlich sicheren Zuflucht, glaubt Kristen eine Erscheinung wahrzunehmen. Ein Phantom, das sie keine Ruhe finden lässt, in den Augen des Klinikpersonals aber nur in ihrer Einbildung existiert.
Verzweifelt versucht Kristen, Erklärungen für das gespenstische Phänomen zu finden. Was sie entdeckt, lässt ihr das Blut in den Adern gefrieren. Um sich und andere retten zu können, bleibt nur die Flucht. Denn in der Klinik geht der Tod um und sorgt dafür, dass niemand sie je lebend verlässt...

Immer informiert sein was ins Kino kommt:
Abonnieren: http://tinyurl.com/KinotrailerDEabo
Facebook: http://facebook.com/KinotrailerDE
Twitter: http://twitter.com/KinotrailerDE
Blog: http://kinotrailerde.blogspot.com/


John Carpenter, der Fürst der Finsternis, ist zurück. Der Kultregisseur, der mit Filmen wie HALLOWEEN -- DIE NACHT DES GRAUENS oder DAS DING AUS EINER ANDEREN WELT das Horrorgenre dominiert, erweist sich erneut als Großmeister des Terrors. Sein neuer Film THE WARD vereint Psychothriller und Hochspannungsschocker, erfahrene Charakterdarsteller wie Jared Harris (DER SELTSAME FALL DES BENJAMIN BUTTON, NATURAL BORN KILLERS) und talentierte Jungstars. Als kämpferische Heldin glänzt Amber Heard (RUM DIARY, ZOMBIELAND), unterstützt von Lyndsy Fonseca (KICK-ASS, HOW I MET YOUR MOTHER), Danielle Panabaker (FREITAG DER 13., MR. BROOKS -- DER MÖRDER IN DIR) und Mamie Gummer (TAKING WOODSTOCK, STOP-LOSS).

snippet.title: The Rum Diary Reviewed by Ian Fitzgerald Johnny Depp Hunter S. Thompson Amber Heard
snippet.description: The Rum Diary Reviewed by Ian Fitzgerald Johnny Depp Hunter S. Thompson Amber Heard Based on the debut novel by Hunter S. Thompson. Tiring of the noise and madness of New York and the crushing conventions of late Eisenhower-era America, Paul Kemp (Johnny Depp) travels to the pristine island of Puerto Rico to write for a local newspaper, run by downtrodden editor Lotterman (Richard Jenkins). Adopting the rum-soaked life of the island, Paul soon becomes obsessed with Chenault (Amber Heard), the wildly attractive Connecticut-born fiancée of Sanderson (Aaron Eckhart). Sanderson is one of a growing number of American entrepreneurs who are determined to convert Puerto Rico into a capitalist paradise in service of the wealthy. When Kemp is recruited by Sanderson to write favorably about his latest unsavory scheme, the journalist is presented with a choice: to use his words for the corrupt businessmen's financial benefit, or use them to take the bastards down.
snippet.localized.title: The Rum Diary Reviewed by Ian Fitzgerald Johnny Depp Hunter S. Thompson Amber Heard

snippet.description:
GIOVANNI DI CLEMENTE presenta
THE RUM DIARY

con JOHNNY DEPP, AMBER HEARD, AARON ECKHART, RICHARD JENKINS e
GIOVANNI RIBISI

Regia : BRUCE ROBINSON

Genere : Adventure Drama

Paul Kemp (Johnny Deep) è un giornalista freelance la cui vita giunge ad una svolta quando si trova a scrivere per un dimesso e fatiscente giornale dei Caraibi. Da New York a San Juan, la sua vita si trasforma in una sfida a più livelli. Catturato da un vortice di alcool, donne ed eccessi di ogni tipo dovrà lottare per realizzare i suoi sogni di scrittore e salvarsi da un gruppo di anime, perse tra l'autodistruzione e i traffici illeciti dell'America del proibizionismo.

snippet.title: The Rum Diary trailer Usa 60"
snippet.description:
GIOVANNI DI CLEMENTE presenta
THE RUM DIARY

con JOHNNY DEPP, AMBER HEARD, AARON ECKHART, RICHARD JENKINS e
GIOVANNI RIBISI

Regia : BRUCE ROBINSON

Genere : Adventure Drama

Paul Kemp (Johnny Deep) è un giornalista freelance la cui vita giunge ad una svolta quando si trova a scrivere per un dimesso e fatiscente giornale dei Caraibi. Da New York a San Juan, la sua vita si trasforma in una sfida a più livelli. Catturato da un vortice di alcool, donne ed eccessi di ogni tipo dovrà lottare per realizzare i suoi sogni di scrittore e salvarsi da un gruppo di anime, perse tra l'autodistruzione e i traffici illeciti dell'America del proibizionismo.

snippet.title: The Rum Diary: A Hop on Pop Culture review
snippet.description:
Ashley Dionne reviews "The Rum Diary" starring Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard, Richard Jenkins, and Giovanni Ribisi.
Directed by Bruce Robinson.

Ashley Dionne is from Port Huron, Michigan.
She graduated from the University of Michigan with a Bachelor's in film in December, 2009.
It is her dream to become an actress, a singer, a screenwriter, and a director.
She loves indie dramas.

Ash has written four screenplays.
She's made short films, which are available on this channel, so please check them out.

She hopes to become a working actress and screenwriter.

Thanks so much for watching this video.
Please give her a thumbs up, subscribe, and tell your friends to do the same.

Thanks again!

www.facebook.com/Ashthemoviegeek

snippet.title: Nic Cage and Amber Heard Talk "DRIVE ANGRY" With AMC
snippet.description:
Buy tickets: http://amcurl.com/bKe

Synopsis
Milton is a hardened felon who has broken out of Hell intent on finding the vicious cult that brutally murdered his daughter and kidnapped her baby. He joins forces with Piper -- a sexy, tough-as-nails waitress with a '69 Charger, who's also seeking redemption of her own. Now, the two of them are hot on the trail of the deadly leader of the cult, all while being pursued by an enigmatic killer who has been sent by the Devil to retrieve Milton and deliver him back to Hell. Caught in a deadly race against time, Milton has three days to avoid capture, avenge his daughter's death, and save her baby before she's mercilessly sacrificed by the cult. In 3D at select locations.


MPAA Rating: R
Length: 1 hr 44 min
Director: Patrick Lussier
Cast: Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner, Billy Burke

snippet.title: Hell Driver - Bande-annonce - VF
snippet.description:
Au cinéma le 23 mars 2011
Réalisé par : Patrick Lussier
Avec : Nicolas Cage, Billy Burke, Amber Heard
Synopsis : Milton est prêt à tout pour rattraper les fanatiques qui ont assassiné sa fille et kidnappé le bébé de celle-ci pour le sacrifier à la prochaine pleine lune. Avec la séduisante Piper, il se lance à la poursuite de Jonah King et ses adeptes, du Colorado à la Louisiane. Pourtant, le chasseur pourrait bien devenir le gibier... Un homme mystérieux aux pouvoirs surnaturels, le Comptable, est lui-même à la recherche de Milton. 
Alors que la route devient le théâtre d'une véritable vendetta, une course-poursuite en cache une autre. Milton pourra-t-il rattraper King avant que le Comptable ne lui mette la main dessus ? Carburant à la rage et au bolide, Milton va poursuivre sa mission. Il n'a que trois jours...

snippet.title: European Premiere: The Rum Diary | Amber Heard (The Fan Carpet)
snippet.description:
Georgina Wahed hits the red carpet for the European Premiere of the Johnny Depp starring The Rum Diary where she spoke to the gorgeous Amber Heard and director Bruce Robinson.

The Rum Diary. Based on the debut novel by Hunter S. Thompson which initiated his long, distinguished and brilliantly unpredictable career, THE RUM DIARY tells the increasingly unhinged story of itinerant journalist Paul Kemp (Depp). Tiring of the noise and madness of New York and the crushing conventions of late Eisenhower-era America, Kemp travels to the pristine island of Puerto Rica to write for a local newspaper, The San Juan Star, run by downtrodden editor Lotterman (Jenkins).

Adopting the rum-soaked life of the late 50's version of Hemmingway's lost generation, Paul soon becomes increasingly obsessed with Chenault (Heard), the wildly attractive Connecticut-born fiancée of Sanderson (Eckhart), a businessman involved in shady property development deals.

THE RUM DIARY is a GK Films, Infinitum Nihil and Film Engine production.

snippet.localized.title: European Premiere: The Rum Diary | Amber Heard (The Fan Carpet)
snippet.localized.description:
Georgina Wahed hits the red carpet for the European Premiere of the Johnny Depp starring The Rum Diary where she spoke to the gorgeous Amber Heard and director Bruce Robinson.

The Rum Diary. Based on the debut novel by Hunter S. Thompson which initiated his long, distinguished and brilliantly unpredictable career, THE RUM DIARY tells the increasingly unhinged story of itinerant journalist Paul Kemp (Depp). Tiring of the noise and madness of New York and the crushing conventions of late Eisenhower-era America, Kemp travels to the pristine island of Puerto Rica to write for a local newspaper, The San Juan Star, run by downtrodden editor Lotterman (Jenkins).

Adopting the rum-soaked life of the late 50's version of Hemmingway's lost generation, Paul soon becomes increasingly obsessed with Chenault (Heard), the wildly attractive Connecticut-born fiancée of Sanderson (Eckhart), a businessman involved in shady property development deals.

THE RUM DIARY is a GK Films, Infinitum Nihil and Film Engine production.

snippet.title: Presas del Diablo
snippet.description:
Kristen (Amber Heard), una hermosa pero atormentada mujer, se encuentra con lasceraciones, cortada, drogada y retenida en contra de su voluntad en un remoto pabellón de un hospital psiquiátrico. Se encuentra desorientada por completo, sin idea alguna del cómo llegó a ese lugar y tampoco tiene recuerdos de su vida anterior a haber sido ingresada. De lo único que está segura es que se encuentra vuln...erable.

Las otras pacientes del pabellón -cuatro mujeres jóvenes igual de perturbadas- no le ofrecen respuesta alguna a sus preguntas y Kristen se da cuenta rápidamente que las cosas no son lo que parecen. El aire se encuentra cargado de secretos y durante la noche, cuando el hospital se encuentra en profunda oscuridad y con sensación de apocalipsis, ella comienza a escuchar escalofriantes y extraños sonidos. Parece ser que no se encuentra sola.

snippet.title: Hell Driver - Bande-annonce - VOST
snippet.description:
Au cinéma le 23 mars 2011
Réalisé par : Patrick Lussier
Avec : Nicolas Cage, Billy Burke, Amber Heard
Synopsis : Milton est prêt à tout pour rattraper les fanatiques qui ont assassiné sa fille et kidnappé le bébé de celle-ci pour le sacrifier à la prochaine pleine lune. Avec la séduisante Piper, il se lance à la poursuite de Jonah King et ses adeptes, du Colorado à la Louisiane. Pourtant, le chasseur pourrait bien devenir le gibier... Un homme mystérieux aux pouvoirs surnaturels, le Comptable, est lui-même à la recherche de Milton. 
Alors que la route devient le théâtre d'une véritable vendetta, une course-poursuite en cache une autre. Milton pourra-t-il rattraper King avant que le Comptable ne lui mette la main dessus ? Carburant à la rage et au bolide, Milton va poursuivre sa mission. Il n'a que trois jours...
snippet.localized.title: Hell Driver - Bande-annonce - VOST
snippet.localized.description:
Au cinéma le 23 mars 2011
Réalisé par : Patrick Lussier
Avec : Nicolas Cage, Billy Burke, Amber Heard
Synopsis : Milton est prêt à tout pour rattraper les fanatiques qui ont assassiné sa fille et kidnappé le bébé de celle-ci pour le sacrifier à la prochaine pleine lune. Avec la séduisante Piper, il se lance à la poursuite de Jonah King et ses adeptes, du Colorado à la Louisiane. Pourtant, le chasseur pourrait bien devenir le gibier... Un homme mystérieux aux pouvoirs surnaturels, le Comptable, est lui-même à la recherche de Milton. 
Alors que la route devient le théâtre d'une véritable vendetta, une course-poursuite en cache une autre. Milton pourra-t-il rattraper King avant que le Comptable ne lui mette la main dessus ? Carburant à la rage et au bolide, Milton va poursuivre sa mission. Il n'a que trois jours...

snippet.title: NBC'c New TV series Playboy Club Trailer
snippet.description:
Starring Amber Heard, Eddie Cibrian, Leah Renee, Jenna Dewan, Laura Benanti, David Krumholtz, Naturi Naughton and Wes Ramsey, the period drama is officially described as follows.
It's the early '60s, and the legendary Playboy Club in Chicago is the door to all your fantasies... and the key is the most sought-after status symbol of its time.

Step inside the seductive world of the Bunny, the epitome of beauty and service, and rub shoulders with the decade's biggest mobsters, politicos and entertainers (like Tina Turner and Sammy Davis, Jr.) With all these larger than life ambitions, there are even greater secrets. Like when innocent new Bunny Maureen - who wants to take the world by storm - accidentally kills one of the Windy City's most powerful mafia bosses... and the only person capable of covering it up and protecting her is Nick Dalton, a man who once worked for the mob but is about to run for district attorney. Bunny Alice is married but hiding an explosive personal life while Bunny Janie is running from a past that threatens to catch up with her. It seems everyone has a secret - none more so than Maureen, who may not even be the innocent orphan she appears to be. Thank goodness Hef's Playboy Mansion is open after hours for a little R&R... and burying your past.

From Academy Award-winning Executive Producer Brian Grazer, Executive Producer Chad Hodge (Tru Calling), and Director Alan Taylor (Mad Men) comes a provocative new series about a time and place that challenged the social mores, where a visionary created an empire, and an icon changed American culture.

For More Visit :
MediaDB - Home of Movie Trailers and Poster images

http://mediadb.blogspot.com/p/movie-trailers.html

snippet.title: Ronan Parke love story - Forever Ep.4
snippet.description:
*Previously Ronan ran out of school and was making his way to Amber and Claire's school, Saint Felix.*
New cast Members: 
Allie - A friend of Ambers (@AllieBiebzParke on twitter )
Text From Ronan to Amber: Meet me at the front of your school ASAP. x
Text from Amber to Ronan: Why? X
Text from Ronan to Amber: Please? X
Text from Amber to Ronan: Sure x
 *At Saint Felix* 
Allie: *out of the maths room window* *To Amber* Look Its Ronan Parke!!! OMG!!!
Amber: *Pretending not to know who it is* Who's that?
Allie: OMG!! How do you not know who Ronan Parke is. He is like the most amazing, gorgeous, talented, cutest guy in the world.
Amber: Well, I've never heard of him.
*PING*
Amber: That's my phone! *Grinning*
Claire: Wow! Your popular today *smirking*
Allie: Claire, why are you smiling?
Claire: it's a secret.
Allie: Please tell me!
Claire: I'll tell you later!
Allie: Okay. Text me now.
Claire: Alright.
Teacher: Girls. Be quiet.
Girls: Sorry sir.
Claire texting Allie: Well, Ronan Parke is here because he's my cousin. AND because Amber met him today and she didn't know who he was but they really got along well and they've been texting all day. So im guessing that text to Amber is from Ronan saying to meet him!
Allie texting Claire: OMG!. Ronan Parke is your cousin! Wow. And she's so lucky. we should see what they do. 
Claire texting Allie: Okay follow my lead. I'll text you then Plan...

-------------------------------------------------------------------
What do you think Claire and Allies plan is.
What do you think will happen to Ronan.
And will Ronan and Amber ever get together. COMMENT YOUR THOUGHTS AND TWEET/FOLLOW ME @MeganParke_ and also FOLLOW @AllieBiebzParke

snippet.title: ICONic Boyz Love Story Ch 2
snippet.description:
*When we got to the rehearsal*
Ambers POV: 
I sat down and watched the boys rehearse, until I started texting my cousin Jillian.
*texts*
Amber- Hey
Jillian- Hey whats up?
Amber- Nm, chilling with the boys(:
Jillian- What boys?!
Amber- You know the ICONic Boyz!
Jillian- OMG!
Amber- Yeah ! Ahh, you should really fly down her and meet them, they're really sweet !
Jillian- Aw really?! I'm seriously flying down there tonight!
Amber- Yay. I met this really cute one named vinny! He has the CUTEST smile ever !
Jillian- Haha.
Nick- Who ya texting ?-smiling-
Amber- Oh, no one, just my cousin. She's flying down here tonight!
Nick- Oh, cool hopefully I get to meet her !
Amber- Dont worry, you will!-smiling-

Ambers POV:
It was time for me to leave, so I went to go sit in the audience so the boys can finish rehearsing. I started to text my cousin again until I looked up to see vinny calling my name.

Vinny- Amber!
Amber- Yes?
Vinny- Well I seen you sitting alone, and decided to come and keep you company-smiling-
Amber- Aw, youre so sweet-laughing/smiling-
Vinny- Haha,thanks.-smiled back at her-
Vinny- Well before I go, is there any chance maybe I could get your number?
Amber- Haha, sure-taking out a piece of paper&pen-
Vinny- Haha thanks-standing up- can I have a hug now?-smiling-
Amber- Of course-smiling back--hugs him-
-All of a sudden, Louis starts walking toward us with Madison-
Louis&Madison- Come on Vin, we need you!
Vinny- Hold on, I'm coming
Louis- Vinny and Amber sitting in the tree k-i-s-s-i-n-g -laughing-
Amber- We weren't kissing Louis ! -laughing-
Louis- What were you doing then ?
Amber- Giving him a hug -looked at vinny and smiled-
Madison- Aw how cute -rolling his eyes-
*The boys walk backstage while Amber sits down*
-All of a sudden, someone texts Amber-
-texts-
xxx-xxx-xxxx- Hey
Amber- Hey,whos tihs?
Vinny- It's Vinny(:
Amber- Oh,hey:)
Vinny- So were gonna be performing in like 10-20 mins, ok?(:
Amber- Ok,good luck!
Vinny- Thanks:)
Amber- Hehe, np(:
Vinny- So, uh I was wondering if maybe you'd like to do something tonight ?
Amber- Me&you, or us and the whole crew ?
Vinny- um, just us?
Amber- Ok, just text me when you guys are done rehearsing!
Vinny- Ok!
*About 15 mins pass& Amber gets a new text message from Vinny*
-texts-
Vinny- Hey, were done rehearsing and coming out on stage in like 2 mins
Amber- Ok, good :)
Vinny- (:
*The ICONic Boyz come out on stage& Vinny notices Amber and smiles, so she smiles back*
*After they perform*
Boyz- So how'd you like the dance?
Amber- OMG, i loved it !
Mikey- Yeah buddy!-laughing-
Boyz&Amber- -laughing-
Thomas- Guys, we should head to our rooms to take a shower!
Amber- Yeah, yous should! Yous are all sweaty ,ew.-laughing-
*Vinny goes up to Amber and hugs her*
Amber- Aw, really?!
Vinny- Yeah, I had to give you a hug because im sweaty
Amber- ugh.-laughing- now I gotta take a shower!
Vinny- You sure do!

Ambers POV:
So, we all go upstairs to take showers. I got out a new cute outfit for the date with Vinny tonight. I went in a quick shower ,did my hair, then did my make-up(the usual :) 

-Amber texts Vinny-
Amber- Hey, what time are we going out ?
(it was already 8:00pm)
Vinny- How about at 9:00?(:
Amber- Ok, just come to my room then and we could leave!:*
Vinny- Ok;)
*At about 8:49 Amber was done getting ready and heard someone knocking on her door*
Amber- Who is it ?
Vinny- I dont know-laughing-
Amber--laughing--opened the door-
Vinny- Hey cutie, you look good !-smiling-
Amber- Thanks, so do you. So where are we going?
Vinny- I was thinking maybe a walk on the beach would be romantic-smiling--laughing-
Amber- Yes,yes it would be-hugs him-

snippet.title: Love is Breakable ICONic Boyz Love Story Chapter 30!!
snippet.description:
Nicole's turn to shake it up:)
Ru's POV
"CHRIS, Help me put this on" Amber whined from across the room. I rolled my eyes. Amber is trying to flirt with Chris. MY boyfriend. 

" You have hands, do it yourself." Chris retorted. I felt myself smile. Not only because I find it hilarious that Chris rejected her; But, because he said that to a girl like Amber. Amber is beautiful, no doubt about it. She's absolutely stunning; Yet, Chris picked me.

 " Whatever." She mumbled before leaving the room. The crew is trying on their outfits for this weeks show. After this week. I'll be taking my spot back. That is if I don't get murdered by Amber first.

" EWWW." We heard a muffled scream coming from the other room. I was slightly startled. Chris jumped up from his seat and pulled me along with him.

" Should we go check?" Chris asked. I nodded and we made our way to the next room. I hesitantly opened the door; And once it was halfway open, the door flew open. It was Amber.

" THERE'S A COCKROACH OVER THERE." She yelled while pointing to a tiny creature on the other side of the room. I let out a chuckle at the terrified Amber and made my way to the cockroach. I took a water bottle from the nearby counter and smacked the cockroach. 

" That's why you screamed?" I said while I turned around, walking back to Chris. I smirked and let a small laugh escaped my lips. "It's kinda pathetic." I said again.

" I don't know, I would be scared if I saw a bug while I was changing." Chris said. I made a weird face at him and watched him smile at Amber. Did that really just happen? Anger filled me and I felt a sudden urge to slap Amber. I've never really felt something like this; Yet, I know exactly what this was. Jealousy.

snippet.title: Never Back Down | Tribute | 15marco95 | FULL HD
snippet.description:
A Never Back Down tribute by me.
Never Back Down is a 2008 American action film starring Sean Faris, Amber Heard, Cam Gigandet, and Djimon Hounsou. It was theatrically released on March 14, 2008. The film's respective tagline/slogan is "Win or lose... Everyone has their fight."
The film is rated PG-13 for mature thematic material involving intense sequences of fighting/violence, some sexuality, partying, and language-all involving teens.

snippet.title: Vampire Academy Trailer (fanmade)
snippet.description:
this trailer is purely fanmade!!

and feedback is loved :)

CAST:
Rose Hathaway - Lyndsy Fonseca
Lissa Dragomir - Amber Heard
Dimitri Belikov - Henry Cavill

VAMPIRE ACADEMY BY RICHELLE MEAD
St Vladimir's Academy isn't just any boarding school - hidden away, it's a place where vampires are educated in the ways of magic and half-human teens train to protect them.

Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, a bodyguard for her best friend Lissa, a Moroi Vampire Princess. They've been on the run, but now they're being dragged back to St Vladimir's where the girls must survive a world of forbidden romances, a ruthless social scene and terrifying night time rituals.

CLIPS USED: 
Kick-Ass, And Soon The Darkness, All the Boys love Mandy Lane, One Tree Hill, Nikita, Dorian Gray, the Hitcher, the Covenant, Tristan and Isolde, Sky High, The Vampire Diaries (1x01) and a video I found on youtube.

SONGS: 
Doves - There goes the fear
Hammock - Like starlight into day
The Glitch Mob - Between two points

VOICEOVERS:
"Hey Gorgeous." (Rose)
"Hoes over Bros." (Rose)
"Buds over studs." (Lissa)
"What?" (Lissa)
--

hi! 
thank you all very much for voting and helping me to find the perfect dimtri.
the votes say this:
Henry: 11
Lyndsy: 23
Odette: 13
Ben: 16
Sophia: 6

now you're probably wondering why I used henry then. it's because he definitely got the looks of dimitri and I wanted the trailer to fit as much as possible. he only has that long hair in tristan and isolde, so there aren't many clips to use for videos. but for the trailer is was enough at least :)
next videos will probably change cast everytime.
first one with ben, next one with henry. :P
thanks again ♥

snippet.title: Don Meredith Dead / Amber Heard Gay / Danny Bonaduce Marries
snippet.description:
Learn guitar chords for FREE through our new game Chord Master: http://bit.ly/ChordMasterYT
http://www.mahalo.com/don-meredith-dead-and-amber-heard-lesbian
http://www.mahalo.com/celebs-in-60-seconds


Former NFL quarterback and Monday Night Football commentator Don Meredith has died.  ''People Magazine'' says the 72-year-old Meredith "suffered a brain hemorrhage" in Santa Fe, New Mexico, and passed away on Sunday.  Meredith's wife, Susan, told the Associated Press, "He was the best there was...We lost a good one."  

Actress Amber Heard "came out" over the weekend, announcing at the GLAAD 25th Anniversary party that she is a lesbian.  Perez Hilton reports that the 24-year-old Heard attended the GLAAD event with partner Tasya van Ree on Saturday.

Actor Danny Bonaduce has reportedly married girlfriend Amy Railsback.  According to CBS, the 51-year-old Bonaduce married the 28-year-old Railsback in a ceremony in Hawaii on November 22.  

Oprah Winfrey and Paul McCartney were two of the celebrities honored during last night's Kennedy Center Honors dinner reception in Washington D.C.  ''The Washington Post'' reports that the other 2010 honorees include country singer Merle Haggard, Broadway lyricist Jerry Herman and dancer/choreographer Bill T. Jones.

WOW!! Amber and I are really stoked! We got alot of Great Comments on both of our channels. Thank you so much and i hope you like the rest.....

....... Nicks POV
I walked down the halls towards my locker, where I saw my partner in crime waiting for me.

"Bro! you gonna gimme the deets from last night or what?!" Joe said with his arms crossed leaning on the locker that was next to mine.

I rolled my eyes and put my jacket in and grabbed the books I needed. 

"don't give me attitude mister.. you're the one who left me with her best friend!!!..., while you go and get your ass!!!! " joe said emphasizing on the word "ASS" 

Nick chuckled , well you know I always get the ass so why do you bother to ask.

"You always leave me with the lame girls , and then the betch had the nerve to get wasted and throw up on me! I deserve some deets man" Joe said yelling at Nick with frustration. 

"Let's just say I left her sore" Nick said as soon as the bell rang.

"Ughh " Joe groaned and Nick replied to him with a smile and patted his back. "I hate you" joe said as they both started to head to their first period class. 

Joe started talking about this big party there was going to be on friday. But his voice became fairly distant as my eyes wonder into the classroom we just walked by. Something distracted me. It was her sweet laughter.. I stopped all of a sudden just staring at her and I noticed what I was doing when I heard Joe cleared his throat, snapping me out of my moment. I noticed Joe was looking at me weirdly. I looked back into the classroom, where I was still standing in front of.  She was laughing with some guy. And that made  my blood boil up . I glared at jerk who she was now feeling her touch, The touch that I wish could me on me. . She looked my way and smirked. I tried to look cool by giving her a nod.She winked at me and wrapped her arms around the jerk's neck. Gosh that girl!

"So is that why you're being weird Joe asked with his eyebrow arched up. I finally looked his way. 

"What are you talking about? You're crazy" I stated while I kept walking.

"Don't tell me your in  love with her now" Joe said smirking at me .

 I couldn't help it, but I am determine to make Selena mine and it was gonna take a lot, but I know she can't resist my charm. I know we both have reputation for being the biggest slut's in the school. But for some reason, it was such a turn on that I still haven't myself in her yet.

"Please Nick! You can't fool me! I saw what happened with Gomez this morning." I sighed trying to act dramatically. 

"Joe. Forget it ok. She's just another girl that I am going to fuck someday " I said, trying to drop the subject. I entered class. 

Joe rolled his eyes "Oh god don't tell me im gonna be part of this. 

I responded "Whatever you say!"  Then both continued to their seats.

After few periods past by  i headed to Lunch. I walked towards the table were Joe, Liam and Logan were seated. I took Joe's apple from his tray "Hey!" Joe protested. I rolled my eyes and smirked. Joe dropped the subject and started talking about some baseball game. I looked over to selena's table. She was sitting with those sexy friends of hers. Who i've fucked a couple of times now But then the thoughts of selena being the only one i haven't made mine made me so hungry. Hungry for her taste. Then she met my eyes. We stared at each other for a long time. Then she looked away as her new victim sat next to her. The need of her was killing me. The guy started to kiss her cheek, then her jaw, then her lips. Damn it! Why did she had to have every guy at her feet?

snippet.title: Drive Angry shot in 3D - Official Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
Release date(s) February 11, 2011
Starring : Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard
Directed by Patrick Lussier
Synospsis

Drive Angry stars Nicolas Cage as Milton, a hardened felon who has broken out of hell for one last chance at redemption. Intent on stopping a vicious cult who murdered his daughter, he has three days to stop them before they sacrifice her baby beneath a full moon.

He's joined by Piper (Amber Heard) -- a young, sexy waitress who liberates her ex-boyfriend's cherry-red muscle car in order to help Milton. Now, the two of them are hot on the trail of the deadly leader of the cult, Jonah King (Billy Burke), who believes it is his destiny to use the baby to unleash hell on earth.

But the bloodthirsty cult is the least of Milton's problems. The police are after him too. And worse, an enigmatic killer known only as "The Accountant" -- who has been sent by the Devil to retrieve Milton and deliver him back to hell. With wicked cunning and hypnotic savagery, the Accountant will relentlessly pursue Milton at high speed across the country until his mission is accomplished.

Fueled by high octane and pure rage, Milton must use his anger to go beyond all human limits to avenge his daughter's murder, before his last chance at redemption is revoked.

snippet.title: And Soon The Darkness - Official Trailer 2010
snippet.description:
Watch Soon The Darkness Online Free http://bit.ly/9j4Ojy

Stephanie (Amber Heard) and Ellie's (Odette Yustman) vacation to an exotic village in Argentina is a perfect "girl's getaway" to bask in the sun, shop and flirt with the handsome locals. After a long night of bar-hopping, the girls get into an argument, and Stephanie heads out alone in the morning to cool off. But when she returns, Ellie has disappeared. Finding signs of a struggle, Stephanie fears the worst, and turns to the police for help. But the local authorities have their hands full already - with a string of unsolved kidnappings targeting young female tourists. Skeptical of the sherifs competency, she enlists help from Michael (Karl Urban), an American ex-pat staying at their hotel. Together they go on a frantic search for Ellie, but Stephanie soon realizes that trusting his seemingly good intentions may drag her farther from the truth. With danger mounting, and time running out, Stephanie must find her friend before darkness falls.



Genre:
    Horror
Director: Marcos Efron
Cast:    Amber Heard, Odette Yustman, Karl Urban, Gia Mantegna, Adriana Barraza

snippet.title: Don Meredith Dead / Amber Heard gay / Danny Bonaduce Married
snippet.description:
Get Kim Kardashian's Hairstyle http://bit.ly/KimKardashianHair
http://www.mahalo.com/don-meredith-dead-and-amber-heard-lesbian
http://www.mahalo.com/celebs-in-60-seconds


Former NFL quarterback and Monday Night Football commentator Don Meredith has died.  ''People Magazine'' says the 72-year-old Meredith "suffered a brain hemorrhage" in Santa Fe, New Mexico, and passed away on Sunday.  Meredith's wife, Susan, told the Associated Press, "He was the best there was...We lost a good one."  

Actress Amber Heard "came out" over the weekend, announcing at the GLAAD 25th Anniversary party that she is a lesbian.  Perez Hilton reports that the 24-year-old Heard attended the GLAAD event with partner Tasya van Ree on Saturday.

Actor Danny Bonaduce has reportedly married girlfriend Amy Railsback.  According to CBS, the 51-year-old Bonaduce married the 28-year-old Railsback in a ceremony in Hawaii on November 22.  

Oprah Winfrey and Paul McCartney were two of the celebrities honored during last night's Kennedy Center Honors dinner reception in Washington D.C.  ''The Washington Post'' reports that the other 2010 honorees include country singer Merle Haggard, Broadway lyricist Jerry Herman and dancer/choreographer Bill T. Jones.

snippet.title: Plaid land chapter 1 a letter from Amber
snippet.description:
Intro

                                                                   
I've been to hell. Not literally. But if you call Plaidson New Jersey hell, you get where I'm coming from. You see in Plaidson you're either on 1 of the 2 sides.

A. rich
Or
B. poor

And you see Since I, Amber Rivera am a citizen of Plaidson... I guess ill give you some play by play or in others words advise. 

Point A: watch out for rich people...yes I'm poor.

Point B: when a rich boy pulls you in a closet you might as well yell "rape!!!".

Point C: ... I've got nothing

But as we conclude today's lesson we can say you're ready for Plaidson new jersey. See you there.

Love,

         Amber Rivera
  

Chapter 1

Nicole's POv

Living is something we only realize is beautiful until someone loses its possession. Last year my mother died. And I don't know my father. Don't get me wrong my life's not that out of the ordinary my mother wasn't brutally murdered, even thou that is terrible, she was sick with cancer.

That is why I'm here in Plaidson, New Jersey to live with my cousin Amber and her family. The funny thing is right now I don't know what to feel. I mean I feel grateful, because I had to sleep in an orphanage until now, but wow. You see dear friend I haven't heard the best things about Plaidson. And I'm guessing you got the whole point speech from Amber. Wow she gave it in letter form! Are you serious? Wow!

"Nicole time for school!" 

That must be amber. Later.

"Coming," I screeched running down the stairs.

"Whoa Buba!" I was shocked to see Amber standing there in a pair of daisy dukes.

"Are those the pants I let you borrow?" Amber began to pout as if she was trying to forget.

"I know they are hideous. But they are all I have left all your other clothes are packed away and mine are in the wash." She sighed while putting on a pair of dorky glasses and retainer. 

"What are you doing?" I asked concerned.

"Getting ready for school," I gave her a look. "Ok look I don't want to get raped or anything so I dress like a dork."

What the hell was wrong with this school? I would not let amber hide her beauty. I took off the glasses and broke them in half after that I took out her retainer and crushed it. She gasped.

"If they touch you ill kick their ass!" I gave her a reassuring smile she nodded.



On the other side of town on the front stairs of school

Nick's pov


"Why are we here?" Zac asked in his pathetic tone.

I sighed

"To drink beer and think a little, stupid ass!" I exclaimed.

"We all know you need time to think for once," Joey murmured loud enough for us all to hear.

We all laughed. That's why Joey is my best friend.

And at that same time Ryan walked up with Jessie Joey's little brother, both of them with crazy sex hair.

"Sup guys." Jessie said lazily.

Joey gave him a look that meant 'we are talking later'
I opened my mouth to say something a little inappropriate when the screeching of wheels made all of our heads snap up.

The sight we took in was... life changing

snippet.title: And Soon The Darkness Trailer
snippet.description:
Synopsis
Stephanie (Amber Heard) and Ellie's (Odette Yustman) vacation to an exotic village in Argentina is a perfect "girl's getaway" to bask in the sun, shop and flirt with the handsome locals. After a long night of bar-hopping, the girls get into an argument, and Stephanie heads out alone in the morning to cool off. But when she returns, Ellie has disappeared. Finding signs of a struggle, Stephanie fears the worst, and turns to the police for help. But the local authorities have their hands full already - with a string of unsolved kidnappings targeting young female tourists. Skeptical of the sherifs competency, she enlists help from Michael (Karl Urban), an American ex-pat staying at their hotel. Together they go on a frantic search for Ellie, but Stephanie soon realizes that trusting his seemingly good intentions may drag her farther from the truth. With danger mounting, and time running out, Stephanie must find her friend before darkness falls.

snippet.title: AMBER HEARD   Muscle Shoals
snippet.description:
Amber Laura Heard (born April 22, 1986) is an American actress. She attended St. Michael's Catholic Academy in Austin, Texas until junior year, when she left to pursue a career in Hollywood. She has played minor roles in various television shows and movies. She is perhaps best known for her role of Greta Matthews on the CW television show, Hidden Palms. She plays the lead role (and title character) in All The Boys Love Mandy Lane, which debuted at the Toronto International Film Festival in 2006 and was released theatrically in 2008.
She has also been on the cover of Maxim and played Seth Rogen's character's girlfriend in Pineapple Express. She appears in the film adaptation of Bret Easton Ellis' novel The Informers.

snippet.title: He's Perfect Chapter 58 Calling Amber
snippet.description:
Chapter 58

Recap:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Jordan~ Well we all know they are like perfect for each other.
Nick~ Well yeah but they have different visions.
Jordan~ Im just glad were so alike.
Nick~ Yeah. *sighs* Me too.
===================================================

With Amber and Joe
Ambers room

Amber~ *sitting on her bed*
Joe~ So?
Amber~ *laughs*
Joe~ Whats so funny?
Amber~ *shrugs* I dont know.
Joe~ No tell me.
Amber~ *smiles* Nothing.
Joe~ You sure?
Amber~ Yeah.

Ambers phone rings

Amber~ Hello?
???~ Dont turn around. MWAHAHA!
Amber~ *scared and hangs up*
Joe~ Who was that?
Amber~ *runs over to Joe and hugs him*
Joe~ *scared* Amber?
Amber~ Hes back, Joe hes back! *crying*

With Kevin and Joe
Hospital

Kevin~ *asks the nearest doctor* Is Dr. Cupcake around?
Doctor~ No but Ill show you to the doctor thats filling in for him. *shows him the doctor*
Dr. Brownie (hehe)~ What can I do for you?
Kevin~ I need to see if Joe Jonas can go home.
Dr. Brownie~ *looks at him weird* Are you his gay lover? (lmfao)
Kevin~ No! Were brothers.
Dr. Brownie~ Oh. Yeah he can go.
Kevin~ Thanks.
Joe~ So can I go?
Kevin~ Yeah lets go.
Joe~ Wait I have to tell you something.

With Nick and Jordan
Kitchen

Jordan~ Im tired. *slumps in her kitchen chair*
Nick~ Really?
Jordan~ *laughs* No.
Nick~ Right. Hey wheres Amber?
Jordan~ I dont know. Amber!
Amber~ *comes down the stairs* What?
Jordan~ Shes right here. *smiles*
Amber~ *laughs* Oh look youre magic you found me.
Jordan~ Cut the sarcasm.
Amber~ Im just playing.
Jordan~ Well dont.
Amber~ *walks back to her room* Wow Mr. Grumpy Gus.
Jordan~ I heard that!
Amber~ *laughs*

Questions

1. DR. BROWNIE?
2. WHOS CALLING AMBER?
3. KEVIN IS JOES GAY LOVER? WHAT?
4. WHAT DOES JOE HAVE TO TELL KEVIN?
5. JORDAN IS MR. GRUMPY GUS?

snippet.title: Never Back Down - Red Carpet World Premier, Hollywood
snippet.description:
The world premiere of "NEVER BACK DOWN" with director Jeff Wadlow joined by cast Djimon Hounsou, Sean Faris, Amber Heard and Cam Gigandet.  Other celebrity guests include Tito Ortiz, Jenna Jamison, Michael Jai White, Kimora Lee Simmons and many more

About "NEVER BACK DOWN":
Set against the action-packed world of Mixed Martial Arts, NEVER BACK DOWN  is the story of Jake Tyler, a tough kid who leads with his fists, and, often, with his heart. Jake Tyler, played by Sean Faris (Yours, Mine and Ours), is the new kid in town with a troubled past. He has recently moved to Orlando, Florida with his family who has relocated to support his younger brother's shot at a professional tennis career.  Jake was a star athlete on the football team at home, but in this new city he is an outsider with a reputation for being a quick tempered brawler.
Making an attempt to fit in and at the invitation of a flirtatious classmate, Baja, played by Amber Heard (Hidden Palms, Alpha Dog), Jake goes to a party where he is unwittingly pulled into a fight with a bully named Ryan McCarthy, played by Cam Gigandet (The O.C., Who's Your Caddy). While he is defeated and humiliated in the fight, a classmate introduces himself to Jake and tells him about the sport known as Mixed Martial Arts (MMA). He sees a star in Jake and asks that he meet with his mentor, Jean Roqua, played by Djimon Hounsou (Blood Diamond, In America).
It is immediately apparent to Jake that MMA is not street fighting, but rather an art form he wants to master. Roqua will take Jake under his wing, but it is up to Jake to find the patience, discipline, willingness and reason within him to succeed. For Jake, there is much more at stake than mere victory.  His decision will not just settle a score; it will define who he is.
 
 
Summit Entertainment will release NEVER BACK DOWN on Friday, March 14th, 2008. 
This film is rated "PG-13" by the MPAA

Produced by Jamaal Finkley
Co-Produced by Earl Crowe
Personality Melanie Nolen A BlackTree Media Production  Thank you for watching! snippet.title: Passing Afternoon-A Tribute To Amber
snippet.description:
After watching "Wilsons Heart" the finale of season 4 of House, and how Amber died, I knew I would have to make her a tribute video-this is that video! 

I never exactly hated Amber, but I never loved her. This is a little vieo I made that shows clips of her in the past as well as the hospital scene, the crash and death, and when she saved House.

I heard Passing Afternoon, and I knew this would be the song I used the video too. For one I liked it, and for another, this was the song that played when Amber saved House.



****** Disclaimer- I do not own House, or any actors, or the clips. 

Thanks to Kate J. for the ending of Wilsons Heart



Enjoy my tribute to Amber.


EDIT:

Oh yeah, I forgot to add, some of the clips were STUBBRON... so thats why they stopped for like 3 seconds and then worked... 

not everything was coorperative for me...

snippet.title: Amber Alert-the sound of an Amber Alert

i used my webcam to get this clip (sorry if i don't get all of the footage, i just wanted to get the Amber Alert sound that plays in North Texas when an Amber Alert is issued in which it follows the EAS sound when the North Texas EAS is activated for an Amber Alert.) i got this off of Fox 4 Dallas (KDFW-TV) i sure it also aired on My Network TV 27 (KDFI-TV). for those who complain that the Amber Alert itself is scary, just listen to this sound that is heard here in this Video.
